I am really disappointed with this chocolate. It tasted cheap and not worth $5, let alone the $30+ I paid for it. Lindor Truffles would have been better for my mother for mother's day, rather than this cheap, gritty junk. Don't waste your money.

I've been buying this by the case on subscribe & save, and have found this to be really useful.  I can simply make it up per the directions, and it makes a quick tasty lunch that gives me energy for hours.  love the sliced nuts in it - gives it some crunch).  I keep a case of it at work for lunch breaks.  When I'm home, I experiment with it by cooking up a cup, and then mixing it with noodles, soups, chili, eggs, whatever I'm trying to use up that is in the refrigerator.  I really like mixing a cooked up cup of this with a packet of the pre-cooked organic quinoa that I also buy through Amazon's subscribe & save, that's an excellent vegetarian protein combination, and digests really well, gives me energy to get through my work day afternoon.  The spice packet that comes with this product is quite nippy (for my Irish heritage taste bud setup) so I use 3/4 of it when I eat it just out of the cup, but works perfectly when I mix it with anything else.  It's a great product, and inexpensive, and easy to prepare, just add water to the paper cup it comes in and microwave.  I keep several cases (6 cups) in the pantry.

Summary: Great Buy!!!  By buying in bulk and auto-ship it cuts the cost down to approx. 0.62 per bag!  Cost in stores is $1.00
Text: Barbara's Bakery Oatmeal Wheat Free Snackimals Animal Cookies, 2.125 Ounce Bags (Pack of 18)

These cookies are the best "high" that I can remember! I am a senior citizen!  It's hard to believe they're good for you too.  The crisp almond-cranberry combination uniquely make them "Addictive!" I almost cried when I was told at Costo that they didn't sell them any more.

This Green Mountain French Vanilla Decaf is weak coffee and lacks the taste of other French Vanilla coffee. The best I could do with this is brew it at a 6-oz cup to give it some flavor. I cannot wait until it's gone and I can try another decaf. Don't settle for this coffee when you have other choices available.

My dogs think these Chicken Zuke's Minis are really tasty. The only problem for me is that the treats are so tiny, that my 90lb German Shepherd swallows them as if they're dust. They're excellent for a smaller dog, I just wish they were slightly larger for the bigger kids in the playground.
This pasta has all the taste of regular pasta, but none of the gluten.  A person wouldn't be able to tell that it isn't regular pasta upon eating it, and that's really the most important part.

Summary: Dents in 2 of the tins when arrived
Text: This cocoa is like any other cocoa, other than it is white and turns pink when touches liquid.  The tin is cute, but 2 cans were dented when they arrived. Not sure if it was from shipping or the seller.  A bit over priced in my opinion as well.

This is just absolutely fantastic tea!  The mint flavor is so pure and refreshing and there is not much sugar in the drink.  It's also completely USDA Organic, QAI Organic,Halal, and Kosher & Pareve - this is a drink that is truly good for you.  For one 12oz bottle there are 60 calories, 5mg sodium, 0 fat, 15g carbs, 14g sugar, and 0g protein.  Numi also donates 1% of net profits to benefit social, environmental & sustainable causes.  I highly recommend this, along with the rest of Numi's Puerh line of bottled teas.

I recently changed over from dry to wet food for my cats.  Trying to find a grain, veggie and fruit free food is not easy, cats are obligate carnivores remember and don't need that stuff (do the research).  I thought I found it in this chicken product.  However, when I opened the can I noticed lots of fluid and potato starch. After spilling out the liquid and rinsing off the potato starch (why is that there anyway? A filler?) The can lost 2 oz. of weight.  With the prices of cat food going up and up, I want more not less.  Don't misunderstand me, this is a fairly good product, a little low in fat, but the cats love it just the same. I just want the company to know if they say its 5.5 oz. then don't pump it up with junk to save a few pennies.  Consumers are not stupid.

Summary: My dog loves Cesar Grilled Chicken
Text: I had looked for years for something that my dog would eat more than a few times. One time I checked out the Cesar Grilled Chicken and he eats it without fail. Although he will not eat any other flavor, I am happy I found the one he will eat.

Cheez-it's are awesome, so I'm just going to give the rating for that. However, there is potential for breakage. I don't know if my UPS guy was in a bad mood that day or what, but my Cheez-it's are 4 boxes of crumbs. I'm thinking of making crunchy,cheesy chicken fingers for the kids with them. They are too broken up to eat them otherwise.

We have been trying many different brands of coconut oil recently and will be hard pressed to buy anything other than Nutiva from now on.  It has a very fresh smell & taste that is far superior to any other brand we have tried.  The economical one gallon tub will last quite a while, but since it does not need to be refrigerated after opening, it will be quite at home in the pantry  :)
When you have kids that eat cereal day and night.  This is a great deal...The boxes came in perfect conditions.

These were cheaper than the omamhasteaks website that i usually buy them from
great deal for the holidays to ship off to that special someone in your family that likes steak

This tea was way too strong for my palate, you might like it. I received it on time,
no issues with shipping and packaging but I mixed it with other teas to lessen the strong flavor and I finally ended up trowing away the unused portion, very strong smell, almost like perfumed.
If you are looking for a subtle taste, you might want to try something else.
This stuff is wonderful.  I like carbonated drinks, but not the sweetness or all the strange ingredients.  I use this with a very small amount of syrup or lemon juice and it's great!

These are a nice, light alternative to ordinary potato chips. To me, they have a sort of buttery flavor. They're crunchy, a little sweet, and not the least bit greasy. My husband took some to work and they were a huge hit with his coworkers. In fact, he had none left for himself!

Summary: natural vitality.  natural calm raspberry lemon flavor
Text: NATURAL CALM is a great relaxing magnesium supplement.  This product will balance your calcium intake and restore healthy magnesium levels. This product also helps reduce stress after a hard days work!  Use as derected.
We always order our coffee KCUPS from Gloria Jeans and experience quick deliveries.  Quality of the product is never an issue and is what we expect
Out of all of the hot chocolate kcups that I have tried this is by far the best one. Not weird aftertaste, and not watered down. Tastes amazing and priced fairly, what more could you ask for?

Let me start off by saying that I seldom write reviews for products, even if I think they're terrific. This has more to do with the fact that I generally wait to see which way the wind is blowing before I jump in. Not so with Quinn Popcorn. I was one of the lucky group that happened upon their Kickstarter campaign and I couldn't be happier about it. We received our mixed case about two weeks ago and every time we want a snack we have to weigh the desire for an amazingly tasty treat with our limited supply. Is it really a "popcorn worthy" movie/episode/? Now that it will be available through amazon we will no longer be forced to resort to less tasty or more processed options. I think you probably get the idea by now that we are fans. Let me finish with some actual critique of the product. The flavors are excellent and the preparation is simple. Truly a great product well worth your snack money.

These are the same coffee pods I used to purchase at my local grocery store. Standard coffee. Can't really go wrong with Maxwell House. And it saves having to mess with coffee filters.

I only wish they came in flavors, LOL.

I purchased this, altho hesitant, for my Mother for Mother's Day.  I considered sending flowers, but when I stumbled across this, I thought I'd give it a shot.  She was very happy w/ the bonsai.  It had two blooms on it when she opened it on Tuesday.  Today is Friday and she called to tell me in now has 3 more blooms!  No dead leaves, very well packaged.  My Aunt now wants one as well!
I do not really like tea but I needed to drink it for medical reasons.  Shipping was really fast and the price was good.  I am sure those who like Sage Tea would love it.

The Pacific Chai Latte mixes, Pacific Chai Vanilla Chai Latte Mix, 10-Ounce Canisters (Pack of 6), are delicious and mix easily in hot water. I have a large cup in the morning and a decaffeinated cup in the afternoon. It's next to impossible to find in the supermarkets, and when I do find it it is much more expensive than the Amazon price. I like the variety of flavors, but I usually choose the vanilla chai latte. I highly recommend it for a comforting warm drink without too much caffeine.
If you like artichokes, do yourself a favor and order some.  Simply delicious!  Use for salads, soups, dips, casseroles.  Could no longer find within 100 miles, so it saves us a long trip.

The Weruva cat food, Mack and Jack from Amazon smells good enough for humans,  we envy our 2 cats their food! :D  The cats bury their little noses in the can and just love their food.  Thank you.  Cece in the U.P.

These chips are VERY GOOD!! I couldn't stop eating them. They didn't last very long.

The reason I gave them 4 stars, instead of 5, is because I think the bags are a little hard to open. I'm not sure why they need to make a potato chip bag that sturdy, you may need some scissors on hand to open them much easier.

I love all teas - hot, cold, you name it. When I'm in the mood for a mint tea, I select Bigelow Mint Medley. I find it has a nice smooth mint flavor. Since that is the mint tea I usually drink, I wondered how Yogi would compare to it.

The two teas have different ingredients. Bigelow's ingredients are peppermint leaves, spearmint leaves, rose hips, lemon peel, hibiscus. Yogi is organic peppermint leaf, organic Assam black tea leaf, organic spearmint leaf, organic cinnamon bark, organic ginger root, organic cardamom seed, green tea extract, organic black pepper, kola nut, guarana seed, organic clove bud, stevia leaf.

I seeped both teas for the same amount of time - approximately 5 minutes (Bigelow recommends seeping for 3-5 minutes. Yogi recommends 4-6 minutes). After seeping, looking at the 2 cups of tea, the Yogi tea is darker -you can tell that there is some black tea included. Both teas are aromatic - the Mint Medley has a nice soft mint smell. Yogi smells like mint, however, it has a more complex smell - there's a hint of cinnamon and it smells a bit sweeter than the Mint Medley. Taste-wise, both teas have a nice mint flavor, however, I found the Yogi tea just had more depth to it: as a tea drinker I can taste that there's black tea included in the blend. There's also a mild tingly sensation after drinking the tea (very very mild tingling). Overall, I found the Yogi tea tasted better and I enjoyed it more.

I don't know the accuracy of its claims to get your chi moving. However, this is a great tasting mint tea.

Summary: Smells and tastes like Big Red
Text: This tea is just disgusting. The rooibos and cinnamon are organic, but they add "natural flavors" to this product and it ends up tasting fake, like the way Big Red gum tastes like. Very disappointing.

This kit is perfect for those of you who are new to home brewing or thinking about upgrading from a smaller batch size fermenter.  It is just as easy to use as some of the smaller size begginer home brew kits, but it has a few more advanced tools that really let you customize and create better home brewed beer.  The products that come with the kit all seem to be of high quality and everything arrived packed neatly and in good shape. The instructions are very easy to follow and guide you every step of the way. It really isn't much harder to use than the smaller 2 gallon begginner kits. The instructions teach you the process with an easy basic, but tasty, brew. It then gives you a recipe for most of the major styles of beer.  All you will need is an ingredient kit, a big pot to brew in, bottles, and a few utensils to cook with and this kit will have all you need to make great beer.  Cheers!

Wasn't crazy about the Corazonas Oatmeal Squares, Peanut Butter Bar!  It tastes okay, but quite dense.  I will not buy this item again.  A friend of mine tried one and she liked it, but also wasn't crazy about it.

Summary: Great flour at a great price
Text: I purchased this flower to try and to see if there was a big difference in the Caputo flour for pizza.....there is a huge difference in taste and form ability.  It is worth the money!!

FDA posts press releases and other notices of recalls and market withdrawals from the firms involved as a service to consumers, the media, and other interested parties. FDA does not endorse either the product or the company.
Creative Energy Foods, Inc. Recalls Crunch¬Æ thinkThin Nutrition Bars Due to Possible Health Risk Associated With Sunland Inc. Peanut Products

Contact:
Consumer:
510-567-1200

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE - October 12, 2012 - Creative Energy Foods, Inc. (CEF) is voluntarily recalling Crunch¬Æ thinkThin nutrition bars which may contain blanched roasted peanuts supplied by Sunland , Inc. to CEF. The decision was made as the result of the expanded recall of peanut butter, nut butters and peanut products by Sunland because of potential contamination with Salmonella.

Salmonella bacteria can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people, and others with weakened immune systems. Healthy persons infected with Salmonella often experience fever, diarrhea (which may be bloody), nausea, vomiting and abdominal cramps. Consumers with the above symptoms should consult their physician.

While no illnesses associated with any of these products have been reported to date, as part of our commitment to the safety and quality of our products we have decided to issue a voluntary recall.

Consumers who have any products covered by this recall should dispose of them. Consumers who have any questions about the recalled products are urged to contact CEF Monday through Friday, 8:00AM - 4:30PM Pacific Time at 510-567-1200, extension #1. Consumers with questions or concerns about their health should contact their doctor or health care provider.

The Best-By-Dates for the recalled products are listed below and can be found on the back of the package, underneath the seal.

These products were distributed at retail chain stores nation wide from March 2010 to October 12, 2012.

This drink had a strong taste of ginger and a little bit of honey and lemon.  I found the ginger was almost over powering.  This was mostly ok, I would drink it if someone gave it to me but I don't think I would bother to purchase it.  You could probably get the same effect with lemon zinger tea, a little bit of real honey and some dry ginger powder and it would cost a fraction of the price of this.
I just had twins in December.  How do I make it through the workday?????  5-hour energy.  Enough said.

Ramune has to be one of the coolest and most unique soft drinks that I have ever seen. My kids had been dying to try this stuff ever since they had come across it on J-Box, the popular Japanese import webshop. Ramune is incredibly popular in it's native Japan, and now it looks like the fun is beginning to spread here in the States.

To open a bottle of Ramune, you have to remove the top, pop out this little plastic plunger from it's casing, and then use the plunger to pop out a marble that seals the neck of the bottle. The neck of the bottle has two indentions that will hold the marble when you tip the bottle back to drink from it, keeping the neck of the bottle clear. Hold the bottle the wrong way, and the marble will clog things up. You can avoid carbonated overflow when opening by pressing gently on the plunger until it depresses the marble; knock it down with force and you're sure to get a fountain of spray.

I've tried most flavors of Ramune before, but I had never tried the lychee flavor until I brought some home this past Christmas. The lychee flavor is really difficult to describe. It's sort of like a cross between strawberry and pear, but there is really no Western analog to the taste. You just have to try it for yourself and judge.

It uses high fructose corn syrup and/or cane sugar as a sweetener (It lists both on the label, which usually means that it uses whatever is cheapest on the world market at the time of bottling. Listing both also means that they don't have to change their labeling every time they change sweetener.)

This is a way fun product that kids (and most adults) will have a blast with. It's a smaller portion (8 ounces) than what we're used to here in the US, but that actually works out for us as we're trying to limit the amount of soda that our kids consume. Ramune works great as an occasional soda treat and the fun factor alone keeps us coming back for more. Ramune is easy to find at just about any Asian market, but for those who don't have easy access to one, ordering here on Amazon would be recommended.

Also, for the safety conscious, I can attest that these drinks are very safe. We've never had a problem with the marble, and I can't find any reports on the internet that would indicate any safety concerns with this drink. It's not a choking hazard, in other words. Ramune means 'carbonated' in Japanese, and I can highly recommend this wonderful and very different drink.
these are awsome....my four year olds love them.  They are an easy snack to take on the go that is nutritious without gluten, sugar or worries:)
Hard to find this product.  So excited to receive; it makes the best soup and can be used in many recipes.

I had been feeding mostly the chicken jerky treats, feeling good about it since the only ingredient was chicken.  Then I saw the reports of kidney failure linked to the ones made in China.  It's hard to find them made in the USA, and they are much more expensive.  Then I found these.  They are made in the US.  Ingredients are chicken and Vitamin E.  The texture is different, but my dog likes them just as well and they have the added advantage of being "breakable", so you can give them smaller portions easily.
Not quite the extremely-soft (almost gooey) fresh Medjools I remember enjoying in California, but pretty close. Overall, really good dates at a good price.

The blend of flavor is fantastic for this olive oil seasoning for bread dipping. I also add this to pita bread with a bit of olive oil and put in the toaster over for a great treat and also mix with olive oil, parsley flakes and a bit of S&P and toss this with boiled potatoes for a great side dish.
The only downside is that it's a bit pricey but so flavorful that a little goes a long way. They do not ship to Puerto Rico so I did have to ship it to a friend who then sent it to me thus adding additional costs.

HAS TWO TIMES THE FILLING OF FIG NEWTONS WHICH MAKES THEM TOO GOOEY AND STICK TOGETHER.  HAVE PURCHASED BARBARA;S PRODUCTS BEFORE AND LIKED THEM, BUT WOULD NOT BUY THE BLUEBERRY BARS AGAIN. TASTE AWFUL.

Summary: A Creamy Delicious Sauce Great For Dipping
Text: Yeah, Taco Bell isn't exactly associated with healthy living. While it may say Taco Bell on the label the sauces are actually manufactured by Kraft Foods. They pay Taco Bell to slap their name on the label and voila you get a more recognizable brand. The sauce is pretty typical. It's tangy, creamy with a little extra spice to it. Great for dipping. Try it out if your a fan of the flavor.

After eating this product, I had a stomach ache followed by hours on the toilet. Those of you with a gluten intolerance and Celiac disease know exactly what those symptoms mean... somehow this product is contaminated with gluten! It is NOT gluten free! Please spare yourself the pain and suffering. These cookies are not worth it.

For those of you who are tempted to continue eating this product even after you have been informed that it is not gluten free, please keep these facts in mind:
1. If you eat gluten, it damages your intestinal lining.
2. If you keep on eating gluten the damage to your intestines will get worse and so will your symptoms.
3. If you further continue to eat gluten you will end up in malabsorption, increase your risk for intestinal cancer, and lead to all sorts of problems including infertility, autoimmune disorders, oteoporosis.
In other words, cheating on your diet is not worth it!
Don't eat Nana's products!

Instead, I suggest you buy something like Pamela's chunky chocolate cookies. They are one of my favorites.

Makes great bread. I've been using 2/3 of this to 1/3 white bread flour for fine results. It's a big bag for a household,but I broke it up into 1 gallon freezer bags and freeze it. Highly recommended.
does what it is supposed to!  works for the irregular shapes of the mike n ike candies as well as for the gum pieces.

This is truly rich and satisfying cup of coffee. I have been drinking it for years. It is truly equal to the best coffee I have tasted in any coffee shop.Another surprise is that is always consistent from order to order. My newest favorite coffee is now the Emerels Big Easy. Just a tad richer with a wonderful aftertaste. I will be alternating these two wonderful blends, for years to come.

Summary: Just average catnip and might be stale!
Text:
My 2 cats like this catnip but nothing "crazy" or weird went on, they just rolled around and rubbed their faces in it (one even ate some). Nothing different from regular catnip. Actually I had another brand that produced crazier reactions like drooling and hyperactivity. Can't remember the brand tho.

And I smelled the stuff and it seemed stale, the date on the back said copyright 2004! This is 2008! Maybe if you get a fresher batch it will be craziness all around.
I love Starbucks coffee of all kinds but the Pikes Place is my all time favorite it is so smooth and rich it is the perfect coffee for the person who likes to drink their coffee black

A handy box with 6 Indian curry's, takes up little space in cupboard. Like I said..can't wait to try them out and experience the awesome Indian flavors and pleasant smells again... If you never ate Indian food, please give it a try, it's not 'scary' or 'weird,' it's very tasty.

Summary: Makes a good cup of coffee
Text:
I was given a keurig B70 as a gift and was asked which coffee sample type(s) I wanted with it.

I decided to take a chance on this one. It was a good choice.

The coffee was smooth and full bodied.

An excellent french roast.
Seven Seas Dressing, Viva Italian is the greatest salad dressing I've ever tasted! And I've had a variety of salad dressings. It's the best, hands down.

I will have to admit that I don't take a lot of heed to the food I give to my dogs.  Typically, they simply aren't show, work or hunting dogs, so I'm not typically concerned about it. I will have to say that since introducing my pet to Beneful, she's actually eating less and has more energy. Overall a good product for my "pot licker." ;)

This is the very best super dark chocolate I've ever tasted.
I snack on a square or two in the afternoon and because the quality is so good... you only need a taste!

These little cakes are really good. I bought them for me and my friend to try and she loved them too.  The only bad thing about it is that I ended up eating half the box in one go and all the sugar gave me a stomach ach.  So be sure to eat them slowly :P

I love the Biotta brand and although we have many
health stores in the area - the ones that sell
the beetroot juice is a distance away - so it
is far better for me to order online. I only
wish that it came in a larger size.
Love the quinoa, good price on this bundle for the red variety.  Hope this continues to be offered since it's very versatile, cooks fast, and is so nutritious!
The flavor is great. I'm using it to make iced tea, but I'm sure it's good hot also. Everyone who has tasted it really loves it.

Summary: Blue Cornmeal Pancakes Put a Smile on My Face
Text: My wife and I searched everywhere as we have accumulated quite a few recipies calling for blue cornmeal.  I was a bit skeptical ordering this online, but the package arrived promptly and the 4 packages all had an expiration date of over a year and half in the future.  We will be using these for lots of great blue cornmeal pancakes! Yumm!

This mix has a lot going on, and it all works. Perfectly toasted/glazed almonds, chewy little bits of apple, balsamic for tang, and flax seeds to make it officially "healthy". Great for between meals...or even for "the trail"!
I gave one of these (chicken flavor) to my dog and he sniffed it and ran away. Will not purchase again. I am going to return it if possible since I only took one out and my dog disliked it.

Summary: Not bad, but there is better out there
Text:
Bigelow Pumpkin Spice (Autumn tea)

Caff-O-Meter: 30-60mg according to box
Ingredients- Black Tea, natural pumpkin flavors with other natural flavors (soy lecithin), cinnamon, licorice root, clove, ginger, pumpkin flakes

**Very important on the first steep you do not go over 4 minutes, it produces a very bitter cup

-Smell: In packet(2)/ Steeping (2) Has a scent somewhat reminiscent of pumpkin but falls rather flat something else overwhelms the pumpkin I may be off but I think it's the clove (scent intensifies when over ice)
-Taste
+Unsweetened : Hot (1)/Cold (2) Flavor of tea is rather bland, I detect very little pumpkin flavor,
+Sweetened: Hot(3)/Cold (3)-Flavor and body of tea really improves with the sweetener. Taste is still a little bland, but there is something very slightly bitter to it (perhaps the licorice, I do not like licorice root).
*I prefer my teas Iced and 1 cup to .5 packet of sweetener. So unless it wows me, without sweetener will always be lower in points so to compensate I add .5 points to the unsweetened taste average.

-2nd steep (3.5) - On the second steep the flavors and scents finally come through and produce a more respectable cup however still on the weaker side for me. It should be noted the 2nd steep will stand up to a longer steeping time. Tried a 3rd steep and it was too weak.

Summary- I paid more for this than on Amazon by ordering a holiday tea collection direct from Bigelow (the single box on here was to much and I wanted variety. I love Halloween and as such pumpkin things tend to suck me in, for the price it is on here I would not discourage purchase however just know there is better out there. If you are looking for something to get you in the mood for fall, this will do. I will happily finish the box, but unless it is clearance at a store I do not plan to purchase more.

If you must have some pumpkin tea now, here is a decent method to get you by (don't expect a miracle of flavor). Pumpkin pie spice (I prefer 1 tsp) "steep" it for 5 minutes hot water then add your preferred tea for a normal steep time. Strain/Sweeten to preference. I use plain lipton loose leaf for now but I can't wait to try this with plain rooibos when I get it.

Feel free to check out my other tea reviews this is only my 2nd so far.

I love giving my dog Bo a variety of dog foods so that he does not get bored with the same taste day after day. Sometimes when I give him a new dog food to try he will turn up his nose and walk away. When I poured the Chef Michael's Grilled Sirloin dog food into his bowl, he dug right in! Bo didn't stop eating until the bowl was empty. Bo's review for this dog food is 5 stars - he loves it!

The only difference between this brand and "regular" noodles is the cooking time. I made these terrified they would be awful, and delighted that my husband actually liked it more than regular pasta. (He doesn't have to be gluten free, so if he likes it, that's a good thing!)

When you're cooking these, you'll notice the water gets really white, so be sure you rinse it off and they do tend to take a little longer to cook than traditional wheat pastas. When you think they are done, take a bite of them to make sure they're not too "al dente". Once they are cooked, they have the exact same color and texture you'd expect.

The price here is pretty good, especially if you have to travel a distance to find them near you - if 12 is too many, split the case with a gluten free friend or two.

I always purchase Krusteaz products when they are available as you cannot get a better product.
Best waffles ever! Great bargain, always can expect a good deal from Amazon.
I looked high and low for a relish close to what my Motherinlaw made. I found it! Bylers is wonderful, the flavor fantastic. I reveived it within a few days. I love it on hotdogs and hamburgers.

RECEIVED ON TIME.----CURBS APETITE.-HAVE BEEN DRINKING IT FOR SOME TIME NOW. IT HELPS ME WITH MI DIET. I TRULY RECOMEND IT.-
NICE FLAVOR -- I TAKE IT AS ICED COLD TEA.

I drink decaf when I drink coffee at night and I've settled on this as the best I've tasted. Most of the others were OK and I don't expect a decaf coffee to taste was good as a regular coffee. But, for my taste buds this works.

BTW, Tully's Kona is my top regular coffee.

Summary: Great for the snob in all of us
Text:
This Espresso bean is one of the best tasting beans I have ever tried on line.
sharp strong unique full flavor with just enough acidity taste.
You can't help but enjoy.
I am on my second order and will continue buying it as long as it remains available
I can compare it to the black tiger that is on the top of my list for full flavor kick in the pants coffees.
This product is sold in vending machines where I work, at $1 per bag.  By buying in bulk from Amazon, you get the product for a fraction of that per-unit cost. Enjoy!

My sister introduced me to coconut oil and although she was weary about me using it as face lotion I showed her that it helped me A LOT with my dry skin and did not cause acne. Normally I have really dry skin on my nose at forehead to the extent that it would start peeling off in the middle of the day... and no lotions would work! :( Coconut oil is the only thing that keeps my skin fairly normal in this regard -- especially with the dry, harsh winters of IL. Any coconut oil would do, but this one is low cost, high quality, has fast shipping. Basically, once this jar runs out, I'm ordering it again.

My corgi loves these greenies! I like it how the greenies come in a zippable bag inside the cardboard box! I have the choice of throwing out the bag and using the box or vice versa!

I chose the free shipping method. It took awhile to ship, but once shipped, it came in a timely manner.
I needed more iron in my diet and have been trying to watch my weight. These chips are wonderful.  They have all the healthy elements I need with the satisfying 'crunch' I crave.

This coffee is a bit bitter, and the flavoring is sort of... muddled. "Vanilla Nut Pumpkin Pie" seems like an extravagant name for a sort-of spicy flavor, even if it is a nice flavor. There's also a fair amount of fine dust, so if you don't have a very fine filter, you'll find it floating in your coffee. I enjoyed the coffee well enough, but would buy something else next time.
These K-cups don't compare to any other.  They are the most flavorful than any I've tried.  I love Dunkin Donuts coffee and this is equally as good and alot less expensive!

I've been eating this wing sauce for years. Found it in a massive container at a surplus store and have been using it in a variety of ways. My favorite is mixing it with some ranch for a zesty dipping sauce. I've used it to make buffalo chicken pizza, I've poured it on wings, I've made buffalo chicken dip with it.

I feel that its got the perfect flavor. I've tried many others, but none have the zesty, tangy spice that this one offers. I'm a big sauce fan and this one is always stocked in the fridge.

Summary: A healthy, well-digesting food that is just a little large for my dogs.
Text: Once their ancient, crumbling teeth break it down, the dogs like this food. It digests well, no problems for them there. But I am afraid it's back to Little Bites for my elderly doggies.

You'll want to cut the larger sections and rinse the grit off them before putting them into soup. My first experience with using dried mushrooms. The shipping and handling is a bit much for the weight.

My whole family is in love with these Nature's Path Organic Granola Bars.  I love chocolate and coconut together, and this bar combines them beautifully.  These are great for in the car, in lunches and they make a great before bedtime snack.

Yep!  Wow, I was really impressed with these cookies.  I was afraid when I bought them they would taste extremely "meh".  But wow.  I look FORWARD to getting to eat one for lunch or breakfast.  I'm impressed w/ the truly delicious taste and w/ all the nutrition it packs.  15% of your daily iron, 4% of your calcium, 6 grams of protein, plus vitamins A & C.  I can't believe healthy tastes SO yummy, is made with whole grains, and ISN'T made with anything you can't pronounce.  Everything in here is natural!  I'm totally sold. This will become a staple in my household!

am sooo pleased about finally finding such a quality company to buy from..I ordered three things from Burger's and they pkged ti very well..and the product itself tasted excellent..TYTY for such a wonderful product Burger's U Rock!! :)

purchase this for a evening dinner guests,they rave about how good they are. Making it a hit with them but i was disappointed as pistachios is my favorite. It is not the company fault it was mine. The Pistachios was salted and i wanted Unsalted but did not looked carefully when i ordered.
i wished i could had eaten them as i am on a salt free diet.
This won`t stop me from coming back. Thank you........

I don't use it on salads with fruit or fruit in the dressing, but it really enhances all other lettuce-type salads. Have used it for many years. Am now going to try Spike too, but it seems best for soups and such.
This is a great idea for giving pills. It worked great.. at first. Now my cat has decided she won't eat these anymore so its back to the pill popper

I like the variety in this pack-nice to not have to pick out individual jars and my baby likes them all! The only thing I would suggest is if you have a picky eater, maybe buy one jar at a time to test them out before you buy a huge box.

Summary: Delicious and best with French Baguette
Text: Tasty canned chicken spread.Especially for eating with French Baguette.Saving time and money for cooking and restaurants. Will order again in future.
These are just as wonderful as the other Kit Kat brands from the UK. The hazelnut flavor is to die for! I highly recommend eating these while drinking coffee. The flavor is unbelievable.

Summary: Palatable, but cheats on the wheat.
Text: I'm loyal to De Cecco for regular semolina pasta. Unfortunately its whole wheat fusilli (this product is fusilli despite the wrong picture) is only better than OK.  The taste is fine, not bitter at all, but the texture is difficult to get right, and resists binding with sauce.  I suggest creamier sauces that bring their own cling.  Note also that De Cecco's "whole wheat" pastas are not made with 100% whole wheat, but "enriched whole wheat" flour -- an euphemism for highly processed wheat.
If you like a cup of coffee available for you anytime, then these are perfect.  One envelope makes the perfect cup of coffee.  Easy to take anywhere. GREAT for traveling!

Summary: Does what it's supposed to do, and does it effectively.
Text:
I'm not an endurance cyclist/runner, but I was pointed to this by one. I was looking for a carbohydrate/electrolyte product more effective than Gatorade, mainly for lifting, and occasionally cardio-intensive sports.

I don't have any grand insight to offer, but can vouch that it does what it's supposed to do. I'm able to work out longer (~2 hours on a consistent basis) without experiencing symptoms of dehydration now, than when I didn't take this and either drank only water, or water and Gatorade (feeling mild nausea + dizziness past ~1.5 hours).

It should also be noted that there's drastically less sugar/sodium per gram of carbs in this than Gatorade. This might not be important to everybody, but another of the reasons I wanted an alternative to Gatorade is that sodium is a migraine trigger for me.

Cool Citrus tastes like soap, Tropical Fruit tastes like shampoo. Both of these tastes are mild, and between them I prefer the Tropical Fruit.
Had been buying greenies at the pet store for the past 7 years, best price on sale was $32.99. These are a great value.

Summary: The best peach favor in the US.
Text:
After trying so many so-called peach flavored tea, I still think Bigelow Peach tea is the best in the US. Why so? Because most peach tea sold in the US either taste like Hisbicus Flowers, or with a strong citrus presence which resembles orange or lemon flavor. My only complaint is that this tea is caffeine-free. To solve this problem, I often put this tea bag in the same cup of my favorite caffeine red/black/white tea, and it works very well.

For those peach-tea lovers, I also strongly recommend the British brand, Fortnum and Mason: Peach Flavored Black Chinese Tea. It is the best caffine-peach tea I tasted on earth. Unfortuantely, you can purchase that only in their UK retail shops, or through their web site.
if you like gummy bears and are looking for mango flavored, then this is it.  My family loves these gummies.  the best anywhere... I did my homework, trust me.  I'm a candy freak!!!
My bichon poodle mix is very, very picky about treats.  He is the only dog I know that will walk away or spit out treats.  But these Filet Mignon Dog Chews he LOVES. I am ordering another bag!

The  most amazing thing about hemp seeds is the energizing effect.  This is not at all like a stimulant, but a deep and gentle energy that feels very natural.  There is a caveat, however.  The hulls.  It is probably impossible to eliminate all hulls and caution is necessary to protect teeth.  I would never sprinkle seeds on anything because of the danger that a hull could cause.  Just not worth it, but taking small bites from a spoon works well.  These seeds are probably as clean as is possible.  I am a convert.
These jelly beans tasted like the real thing.  The kids had fun tasting the different and some disgusting flavors (like dirt flavor for example).  I ordered more boxes!

I was really excited to try this brand as I've heard good things about it. I appreciate that all of the ingredients are organic however the overall taste of the product (to me) isn't that great. The chocolate "flavor" itself reminds me of Hershey's Chocolate Syrup that you'd put on ice cream.

The "Endangered Species Otter, Smooth Milk Chocolate (48%)" tastes more dark than this, and much more "chocolaty".

I was pretty disappointed with this. It's incredibly dry, to the point of being almost crumbly in your mouth. I also thought the flavor itself could have been better.  I've made jerky myself that tastes much better than this.

Summary: Do not use this sugar for layer cakes if you intend to decorate them
Text: Too soft: I just used this sugar to bake one of the layers for a firm pound cake-like layer cake intended for decoration (Wilton Butter cake recipe). This is a pretty hardy cake and can stand up to changes in temperature etc and still turn out well. I had already baked several of the layers with regular granulated sugar before I ran out and decided to use some of this baking sugar. Be forewarned, this sugar makes cakes far too tender. The layer literally fell apart coming out of the pan and it was well cooled and in a pan liberally covered in cake release. Even when I was mixing the batter, it for some reason stuck to my stainless bowl and was impossible to scrape entirely out. I'm sure this is good for meringues and such, but I would never attempt to use it again for a cake or even cookies. You would never get them out of or off the pan.
I LOVE this product.  Cherry soda without all the sugars and chemicals present in standard commercial brands.  Wonderful flavor with a nice fizz.
It is not obvious from the product description but these are NOT single serve ESE-type espresso pods.  They do not fit in our Krups espresso machine at all.

I've been paying $6 for an 8 oz. bag so this is a great deal.The box was quite heavy and I received free shipping,I almost feel guilty! I add fresh basil and several italian cheeses to mine and serve on pita or wrapped in lettuce-yummy.
Helped when I had a cold and soar throat and could not make it to the doctor-- I would purchase again

Summary: Great product gets rid of tartar!
Text: My vet recommended these chews to help with the tartar on my older dog's teeth and said she needed to come in in 3 months to see if she needed a teeth cleaning (over $100).I began feeding her one a day. After a month I looked and most all of the brown junk near her gums was gone. Little did I know that dogs do not have the enzyme to break down this stuff as humans do. Such a deal and my dog loves them. They are a little expensive but seem to do the job.

I guess my palate is not as sophisticated as I had thought. I'm a rather adventurous diner but this truffle oil really cashed me out. I tried it on scallops and pretty near had to trash them. I have no idea what amuses people about truffle oil. I gave mine away (ananomously).

I well remember when I was a kid and my parents would bring home from the store old fashioned DARK brown sugar. To me it tasted as good or better than any candy, and wasn't like the white sugar with syrup added that passes for brown sugar today.
This Billingtons Natural Dark Brown Molasses Sugar reminds me of the way brown sugar used to be. It is richly flavored and delicious!
If you like genuine dark brown sugar, this is the product.

Summary: To me this is the best taste of Gefilter fish but one  bottle was broken.
Text: I would say the gefilte fish is five stars quality but one bottle was broken. I left massage to amazon packing people but with on response to me. As I did not know it was broken so the fish source was dropping around on my carpet upon my kitchen. This packing was so out of my imagination. It was over sized box without a proper cushioning. So the cans and glass bottles in conjunction to empty space composed a perfect rattling. My lesson to learn here was that I shall never combine the glass bottle and can in one order.
Good flavor and a good price too.  I like stronger coffees, and this is a nice bold cup without any bitterness.

We all know what the product tastes like, so no need to review that. I was initially concerned these wouldn't be shipped in time, since a lot of the other reviews described cancelled orders, etc. But I noticed that many of them seemed to be referring to buying them as part of a manager's special or something and figured I'd give this a try. I received the Skittles in 2 days (Amazon Prime, 2-day shipping) with no problems. They were packaged well and they are otherwise just as described. So while I can't speak for the problems that others had, for me this was a flawless order. 5 stars.

Edit: I ordered this a second time recently. Just like the first time, which was several months prior, they arrived promptly and in excellent condition.
Excellent product!! great tasting!! super healthy!! my 5 year old loves it too!! Can't ask for anything more.  Bye bye pediasure and ensure!

I am lucky that I am *not* gluten intolerant but for health reasons I'm trying to limit my gluten intake. This means I can choose snacks from either side of the fence so to speak. I've tried and like Snyder's non-GF pretzels in many of the different varieties like Butter Snaps, Pumpernickle, and regular Sticks and Twists.

Of ALL the pretzels I've tied , these are the BEST.

They are crispy and a little harder than the regular sticks; they are a little less salty than the regular kinds as well with just a bare hint of sweetness. They taste what I'd call very homemade in a way I can't exactly put my finger on, but definitely not a run of the mill taste.

For comparison, I've tried the Glutino GF Pretzels which are also VERY good but at generally a much higher price per bag. They are pretty much on par with quality of flavor even though the tastes are very different. The Synder's brand is definitely something special.

Highly recommended!

This litter has a "maximum ammonia shield" that is great for oder, but will poison your cat if it sticks to their paws and they ingest it. Check out the product reviews for the item that pops up first when searched on google: www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B000633RG0
Review after review says the same. Save youself an expensive very bill.

My teething 8 week old babies really like this thing, they even play tug of war with it. By far the cutest thing is when they drag it around by the ribbons, it's almost as big as they are. Shows up nicely in photos with my black and grey darlings. Also a good full-body work out for them, they can chew it but also get the back paws involved.

As babies start to teeth they tend to want snacks like these that can be a bit more appettizing than a plastic teething ring.  They can even be a good source of vitamins for that picky vegetable eater.  Have ordered them several times in bulk.

Let me start by saying that I LOVE okra. I grew up eating okra dishes my mom made and I can't get enough. I'm also lazy, so when I saw that I could get pre-made okra in a box, I had to try it. There are a bunch of other MTR boxes I've tried and some (like the pongal) are actually pretty good.

The Bhindi Masala was terrible. First, there is almost no okra in the box at all. There is an occasional bit of green floating around, but for the most part, the package is full of some dark brown sludge that looks like an oil spill. Second, you can probably guess why the sludge looks like so oily...the package has a ridiculous amount of fat. I thought that veggies were supposed to be healthy!

Regardless, try some other MTR boxes. Bhindi Masala is definitely one to skip. Anyone out there want the remaining boxes from my 10-Pack?

Summary: Tasty in moderation, taste better than they look
Text:
The resealable package is very nice, unlike their elvish competition.

Upon first opening the package, the Chips Ahoy Chewy Gooey cookies didn't look that appealing compared to the photos on the package. The cookies are soft, dark, and small, only about 2 inches across. Because they are filled with chocolate, they can get crumbly and therefore might break apart during shipping. Photo uploaded. I think they could make the package smaller and contain these type of cookies better.

They taste good but very rich, one or two at a time is enough for me. Which is good because 2 of these cookies have 18% of your daily saturated fat allowance and 13g of sugar. I would recommend these for an occasional chocolate cookie fix, but enjoy in moderation.

Stash Premium Chai Spice Black Tea can be hard to find on the local shelves, but is never more than a few clicks away on Amazon! The price is great and delivery is always as promised. Enjoy your tea from Amazon.
I had hoped this would compare to Starbucks Pike's Roast; however we couldn't drink it and neither could several friends we gave it to.

Summary: Brilliant for the lazy gourmand / bachelor
Text: I originally picked up this product in a market on a whim, and it was my introduction to the world of dry rub.  It's still my favorite.  All you do is rub this stuff on raw chicken and cook it however you like (toaster oven works fine).  You're eating tasty food in 15 minutes and have very little in the way of dirty dishes... my credo in my bachelor days.

What can ya say? It's Melitta of course it's good:} I still have the box I bought last year. Buying a case of filters may seem silly but you'd be surprised what these things are good for! They are AWESOME for filtering fryer oil, using for snack cones etc

On a recent stay at the Westin Kierland Resort in Scottsdale, I took part in a single malt scotch tasting sponsored by their Food and Beverage Department.  The beverage director used glasses of this shape and size, and talked about how the shape of the glass can enhance the single malt experience.  I was initially skeptical, but as soon as the tasting began I was convinced, and started looking to purchase a few for myself as soon as I returned home.  I only rarely drink single malt scotch (too expensive) but I've found my enjoyment of those rare moments increased by 100% as a result of these glasses.  They are pricey, but a wonderful way to help you enjoy your favorite single malt scotch, and I recommend them highly. Plus Amazon's prices were the best I could find when I purchased them.

Summary: They taste just fine at least...
Text: I've only eaten a couple of these so far, so I can't vouch for effectiveness, but I can say that they don't have any odd taste to them - they taste good like regular lollypops.

Strawberry Whoppers are one of our very favorite candies.  Fortunately they are relatively inexpensive because once we open a box we eat them all.  Of course they would last a bit longer if we didn't have to share them with Max and Lady, our two miniature schnauzers, but they are very demanding.

We recently got one of the Quaker Soft Baked Oatmeal Cookies to try ViA Influenster and Quaker. And my family loved them! They don't taste store bought at all. They tasted home made!! Very soft and moist!

Summary: 100% Agar. Good price, worked well as a food stablizer.
Text: Not really much to say about the product other than it arrived similar to as pictured and works as described. I used it as a natural stabilizer for doughnut icing which was excellent. American Wholesale got it to me in 4 days. I purchased 2 oz. USA product.
I love the bold taste of this coffee. No aftertaste or bitterness. I love the frustration free packaging. And at $0.60 per cup it's a great value for a k-cup!

Summary: Just what I was looking for
Text: Jennifer's review was spot on, I love this French Vanilla cappuccino! This is exactly what I was looking for, yes it's not your Starbucks cappuccino, it's more like what you get at mini-marts or service stations. I'm not a hard coffee drinker and this is just what I was looking for, Thank You, Jennifer.

I was introduced to Woody's as a 'secret' ingredient for baked beans by  a dear friend who unfortunately passed away prematurely.  Mike Dale's baked beans live on however among his many friends and he swore this (along with liberal bacon ends and pieces and Van Camps baked beans) was the secret ingredient.  I have to agree and have never failed to make it in his memory every year.  Always a big hit!

I read the last few reviews indicating no dented cans and hoped for the best.  My box arrived today and I too received badly damaged, dented and unusable cans.  I'm not terribly picky but most cans are dented at the rims/seams and all are badly smashed all over.  This was my last hope for canned pumpkin for my dog.  I do not believe the Amazon packaging is the problem. The cans were already dented prior to being shrink-wrapped.  I do not believe stores would put these cans on their shelves and I would never buys cans with this much damage. I have never been unhappy with an Amazon purchase, but this product was a waste of my time.

i know the new version is supposed to be better for me, but it isn't ANYTHING for me (or the company's profits)if i will not buy it, as i will not eat it.  i actually threw out the box with unused product in it.
Our family favorite pancake mix.  Used to be carried at our local upscale grocery store.  Not any more... so glad to find it!

Summary: Restaurant quality Tropical Tea at home
Text:
I was in a restaurant in Long Beach the other day and loved the Iced Tea. I asked the food server what the brand was and he went back and wrote it down for me. I went looking for a reasonable way to buy some for home use and found this product at Amazon. It's very easy to prepare and tastes fantastic.

If you like un-sweetend but flavorful Iced Tea - this is delicious!

I absolutely love this tea.  I was never much of a tea drinker but love licorice so I decided to try it.  It has a sharp, clean taste of licorice with just a bit of spice.  My mother who is a huge tea drinker does not care for licorice but agreed to try it after I raved about it.  She did not like it at all, so I would say that you do have to like licorice to enjoy this tea.

I tried everything I could think of to disguise my cats' pills, and nothing worked... until now!  My kitties love the pill pockets so much that they try to steal each others' pills! The pills I am giving are too big for the cats to swallow whole, so I break them into quarters and wrap each piece in 1/2 a pill pocket (they are soft like playdough so it's easy to mold them around the pill pieces).  I start by giving the cat a little piece of a pill pocket (without a pill) to whet his appetite, and then he quickly gobbles up all 4 quarters of the pill one after the other after the other... and still looks for more!  I'm surprised the cats don't chew these and discover the pill inside, but for some reason they don't. These are amazing!

Summary: A good snack, but not a great one
Text:
I generally like Kashi stuff, and love banana bread- so I thought I would give this a try. The Banana Chocolate Chip bars are not strongly favored of banana (its pretty subtle) nor are there many chocolate chips (which helps keep the calories to a reasonable 140 per bar, with only 3 grams of total fat).

The package is correct in that they are "soft and chewy" but they are also a bit dry. I had mine with coffee, which seemed to complement each other. Without something to drink, you will find these a bit too dry I think.

Ingredient Check: the reason the banana flavor is so subtle is that the first ingredient listed is "apple puree concentrate". The second is seven grain flour (which gives it the dryer texture and slightly nutty taste). Then pumpkin. Then "evaporated cane juice invert syrup" aka sugar. Then vegetable glycerin. Finally banana puree makes an appearance. So first in name, but clearly not in the ingredients.

On the plus side, 1/2 serving of fruit and of veggies per bar each doesn't hurt. And the 4 grams of Fiber per bar is 17% of the total daily value, which is outstanding.

On the negative side, these aren't organic ("all natural" doesn't really mean anything), and do appear to have quite a few potential allergens. Those sensitive to the following should take notice: wheat, milk, soy, egg, PEANUT and ALMOND and may contain other tree nuts (emphasis added- you wouldn't expect this from the general product description and nut allergies are not to be messed with).

In summary, while I liked these as a snack with coffee (especially at the Amazon price) the banana flavor was pretty subtle, chocolate chips rather spare and the texture was a bit dry. But the calorie, fat and fiber profiles were quite good for a snack. As a healthy snack I liked them, but did not love them.

Summary: My cats have been happy with this for years.
Text: My cats have been eating and enjoying this stuff for years and it seems to have helped the one with urinary tract problems. I suspect that the cats who got sick, got sick for some other reason. It is a bit hard to find. Not all pet or grocery stores carry it.

Summary: A Good Combination of Flavors and Textures
Text:
As the weather changes, I am on the lookout for this season's beverage. Tried quite a few of the k-cup offerings, but wanted to try something different.

Nescafe Memento Cappuccino is a very good cool weather choice. The foamy top layer gives you the feel of a coffee shop beverage, without having to leave the comfort of your home. Per their description, the premixed packets contain real coffee, milk and sugar, which is what, captured my attention in the first place. Many of the coffee companies, in an attempt to help the consumer cut calories offer that horrible stevia stuff, which in my opinion leaves a horrible aftertaste and I avoid any products with that or sucralose as an ingredient.

Not too sweet, not too bitter, a good combination of flavors and textures for that midafternoon break from the rest of the world.

This tea has a nice chocolate flavor. I like to have a cup in the evening to satisfy my chocolate craving with no calories or caffeine. It's also a good cold weather alternative for hot cocoa if you are trying to watch your weight. I like that there is no mint flavor with the chocolate--not easy to find. The tea doesn't get bitter or too strong if it brews a little too long and the black tea doesn't overwhelm the chocolate flavor. This was a great value for Stash tea on Amazon!

While this bar is nothing to become addicted to, it's a nice, filling snack. The fruit filling isn't overdone. There's just enough of it to give the bar a nice, slightly sweet taste without getting oozy and gooey. The bar isn't overwhelmed by flavors, so it isn't sickly sweet like a lot of 100 calorie snacks are. I wouldn't substitute this for desert (for that, I use Fiber One brownies) but I'll enjoy having a bar with lunch or between lunch and dinner!

This won the Award for the Healthiest Oatmeal! I can see why 12g of Protein and it taste great! No added sugar or salt and it is so creamy it is by far the best instant Oatmeal I have ever had! And it hold me over past lunch. Love it!!!

****
Tazo's Calm Herbal Infusion is a nice chamomile tea. I taste the chamomile and some flavorings, and they are not unpleasant, just hard to pin down as to what they are besides the chamomile. In general I'm not a big fan of tea with flavorings added, preferring the subtleness and authentic taste of the real thing.

The ingredients in Calm are: chamomile flowers, hibiscus flowers, spearmint, lemongrass, rose petals, blackberry leaves, safflowers, peppermint, sarsaparilla, lemon balm, licorice and natural flavors. It is caffeine-free!

Tazo is an interesting company that makes only super premium teas. They are socially responsible, based in Portland, and have the motto, "The Reincarnation of Tea". Tazo is owned by Starbucks. Their web site is fun and quirky, with a Zen-type focus, definitely worth checking out. It is unclear, though, from their web site, how many of their ingredients are organic or kosher, and they do use some "natural flavors" in their teas--this wording seems a little vague for a super premium tea.

On the package, Tazo writes, "a soothing blend of chamomile blossoms and other relaxing herbs." On their web site, Tazo describes the flavor profile of Calm as "creamy, floral, minty, toasty, sweet, honey-like. As the name gently implies, Tazo Calm has a lovely floral bouquet with an apple-like flavor and distinct toasty notes. Naturally sweet in a nice light way, with a smooth finish". Tazo describes the aroma as "minty, hay like, rose". I don't taste all of these various flavors, but I do taste the chamomile, and it is fine, not overwhelming or as artificial tasting as several of the other Tazo teas I've sampled.

The bulk packaging is a definitely plus, making Tazo Calm much more affordable.

I would rate this tea, and Tazo in general, as good---better than premium teas like Stash or Celestial Seasonings---but not as good as Numi. I'm soooooo spoiled by Numi teas, which is why Tazo Calm gets only four stars.
****

Summary: A great deal on great popcorn.
Text: This would probably seem like too much popcorn to buy, but it's a great gift. My friends and family loved it. It taste amazing! This is a great deal on this popcorn too. I will be buying this again.
It tastes pretty good, but it says to use a lot of water on the package ... 3 quarts seems very excessive for mac and cheese.  Works well with half of that.

I just received my order of this and the regular PB2 today. I've lost 53 pounds on my current weight loss and exercise program, but have been wandering off down the road to fat land again, with peanut butter and chocolate chips. I had this for dinner tonight on a multigrain bread, with a banana sliced in. Can't even imagine the calories I saved and I have no desire to dig into the regular peanut butter jar.

The taste isn't quite like real peanut butter, more like roasted peanuts to me, with just a hint of chocolate flavor. Doesn't matter whether it has the exact taste or not as long as the fat is gone and the taste is good. This passes the test with flying colors.

The texture is not quite like the creamy fat of real peanut butter either, but I'm not bothered by it at all.

I will buy this again and hope that my review helps others to at least give it a try. It might just be my new BFF for the next 40 lbs.

Glad I heard about this and decided to take it for a test drive.

This is on my subscription products and if you could sign-up for weekly deliveries I would...that's how good it is. Okay, maybe not weekly, but I usually can't wait between my monthly deliveries and order an extra delivery each month. It's just the right combination of Orange and Mango -- not too mango-y, not too orange-y! Refreshing! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

I love these. I needed plain panko bread crumbs for a chicken recipe and these were all that they had. They were great. I make fat chicken strips, dip them in egg, then bread them with these and pan fry them. I make a dipping sauce of mayo and honey for them. My husband and stepson love them. In fact, my stepson requested that I make them for his birthday dinner.
I have had a hard time finding them in my supermarket all the time, so I ordered a case from Amazon. I even gave a couple of boxes to friends so they can see how great these are.

I got my almond butter in the mail and opened it. too my surprize i found chunks of almond butter
all around inside the box. the almond butter become unsealed and splattered all arround inside the box during shipping
the shippers never heard of wrapping the almond butter in bubble wrap. in order for it to arrive to my house safely from
amazon.com. the bottles where never comletely inclosed in bubble wrap. i called amazon.com up and they dont want me to return the broken jars of almond butter i can not eat them after this
amazon.com says they will refund my gift cards
i am sure glad they take my word for it
amazon. is great they reallystand behind what they sell at amazon.com
i will continue to shop there
It may be a small packet, but it packs a powerful punch. I usually add a little extra water to make it not so strong.

Blue-buffalo is just the best dog food ever. I can't tell you how it tastes of course, but if you read the ingredient list, you will see your dog is not being fed corn meal and/or other by-products that affect the health of your pet. It will keep your pet healthy and this kind of quality diet will help your pet live longer. It is much more expensive than Pedigree or any other supermarket available food, but it is worth it. You are paying for true quality meals not just corn and bones that are grinded in the seemingly great Pedigree. If you go to the Blue Buffalo website, you can take the TRUE BLUE test to compare your brand of food to Blue Buffalo and they will give you a $5 OFF coupon for your pet food purchase upon completion of the survey. One thing to note is that even though this particular bag of food is for small breed puppies, it will not be easily chewed on by extremely small breeds like Chihuahuas. My Chihuahua was supposed to eat solid food since he was 2 months old, but could only chew BlueBuffalo until he was 8 months. It is a little tough because it addresses EVERY puppy, not MINI puppies. So, if you have an extra small breed pet, find a decent brand like Royal Canin MINI Baby Dog Food 30 while it develops stronger teeth to chew on Blue Buffalo puppy food. Blue Buffalo is better than Royal Canin. However, you have to make sure your puppy is ABLE to chew on his kibble so that it does not get malnourished from eating to little. Once your puppy grows strong enough to chew on Blue Buffalo, switch him/her. It is simply the best.

Unlike the Party Mix offerings, which my cats love and are a hard crunchy product, the Whisker Lickins line is soft and the flavorings are a bust as far as all my cats are concerned.  Friskie's missed on this one.
these taste amazing. might make the poops burn a little :o but they taste amazing. the salt and vinegar ones are the best and very addicting.

These are well done dried fruits and nothing wrong with them.  However, I didn't give it a 5-star because about the same time I ordered these, I simultaneously raided the bulk foods section of my local grocery store and put together a dried mix that I liked a lot better.

This is my diet secret> I needed soething salty and crunchy in my bag of tricks to help keep me on my diet, I love these things! Even if I eat a whole large bag it's still about 300 calories! I like all the flavors and I really like the samll snack size bags. I couldn't get them anywhere but on AMAZON!
I love these tomatoes. I buy them buy the case at the store. I enjoy these in chili, & I also have them tossed in with cooked pasta, especially spaghetti. Also good in goulash. Highly recommended.
The service is ALWAYS good! They are always prompt, as well. My cat loves the stuff and won't eat anything else.  A+++!!!

Summary: Good and healthy food, but an unwanted side effect
Text:
Dr. Harvey's Canine Health Miracle Dog Food pre-mix is handy if you feed your dog home-cooked meals. It contains a lot of veggies and nutrients, and only takes a few minutes to add to the protein (browned bison, for my dog) and oil (olive is what I use) for a complete meal.

My dog likes the food and eats it all with relish. She's healthy eating it, too. I have only one complaint. The pre-mix, when hot water is added, turns a dark pink. I talked to someone at Dr. Harvey's customer service number, and was told it's probably beets that are making it that color since the food contains no dyes. The problem with the food taking on that dark pink color is that a dog with white hair eating the food will get dark pink stains on the hair around her mouth. When she eliminates, it also stains the white hair in that region dark pink! Sometimes she will chew on one of her paws soon after eating and--you guessed it! The white hair on that paw turns dark pink! I've tried thoroughly washing her whiskers as soon as she's finished eating, but it doesn't remove the pink color. Washing in the other stained areas doesn't help either.

If your dog has a dark coat, it probably won't show. Just be aware that a dog with a white coat is going to have some dark pink staining after eating this food. I suggested to Dr. Harvey's customer service agent that removing the beets and replacing that veg with something else might be a good thing to do, but I don't guess they took me seriously! Maybe no one else complains...or cares about having a two-toned dog with dark pink stains on her coat.

My Wheaten puppy likes these treats and I like that they're made from good ingredients. But I gave this product three stars, because there was a problem with its packaging. The interlocking seal doesn't line up, so the bag is impossible to close. I guess I'll just repackage the treats myself. It's not a huge problem, but I'm just a little disappointed.

I normally make my own baby food, but when we travel my stuff doesn't hold up very well so I give my baby this and she LOVES it. She hates jarred food and I normally can't get her to eat it. But she will eat this stuff. I have even tasted it myself and it is pretty good.

This assortment pack of Hi-Chew is well worth the money. I enjoyed all the flavors, but my favorite is grape. Although I am surprised at the Saturated Fat content, (4.5g). Didn't expect something like this to have that much fat in it.
Our dog is allergic to wheat.  It is difficult to find gluten free products in the pet stores.  These are great and my dog loves them.
I haven't try these yet, but I priced them at Walmart. A pk for large dogs has 32 stix and is $12.00.

Summary: "Tres intense" K-cup blend stronger than the usual fare
Text:
Dark Magic is for coffee drinkers searching for something bolder than the breakfast blends and flavored coffees ubiquitous on supermarket shelves. Whether it will satisfy depends on what you normally buy at coffee shops. My wife favors a latte or mocha, so she found Dark Magic too strong. I prefer an Americano, so I liked this roast.

I tested the Dark Magic blend on Keurig's small cup (5.25 oz) setting to capture the strongest flavor. It was a nice improvement from Green Mountain's Fair Trade Gingerbread I drank earlier in the week. Dark Magic is bolder than Tully's Coffee Kona Blend or Green Mountain Coffee Breakfast Blend but no more bitter.

If you need more caffeine, I recommend you add a SToK Caffeinated Black Coffee Shot.

In summary, I like "tres intense" roasts and Green Mountain Coffee Dark Magic is the darkest I have found in the Keurig lineup. I will post an update should I try a stronger blend than Dark Magic. Rating: Four stars.

BTW: Here are other coffees I recently reviewed for Amazon:

5 stars: Van Houtte Chocolate Raspberry Truffle
4 stars: Tully's Coffee Kona Blend
4 stars: Green Mountain Coffee Dark Magic
3 stars: Green Mountain Coffee Breakfast Blend
3 stars: Green Mountain Coffee Fair Trade Gingerbread

I've had almost every type of cereal out there, and this is the best.  Take a delicious, perfect, organic raisin bran and add crunchy, lightly sweetened oat clusters lightly flavored with Organic Cardamom Seed, Organic Fennel Seed, Organic Fenugreek Seed, Organic Nutmeg.. what do you have?  Mouth-watering perfection. As a bonus, it happens to be healthy.

THERE IS RISK IN LIFE'S CHOICES. I CHOSE STEVIA  LIME FLAVORED DRINK MIX BECAUUSE I WANTED A DRINK MIX THAT QUENTCHED MY THIRST.  THE LIME FLAVOR WAS A GOOD CHOICE.  I FOUND I COULD USE A WHOLE FLAVOR PACKET IN A QUART OF COLD WATER AND HAVE TWICE AS MUCH AND STILL HAVE A REFRESHING LIME FLAVOR AND NO CALORIES.  I'M PLANNING ON PURCHASING ANOTHER FLAVOR SOON

Totally misleading; where do i begin.

It is not GOJI BERRY like the heading implies; rather, it is goji flavor. Furthermore; it has lots of other ingredients although the title leads you to believe otherwise.

It has raspberry leaf, hibiscus, strawberry FLAVOR, licorice powder... a very complex blend in my opinion; considering they lead you to believe it is: GOJI BERRY, MATCHA and GREEN TEA.

Goji berries are full of nutrients and antioxidants. WHAT THE HECK IS "GOJI FLAVOR" and why does the heading on the front of the teabag state it is goji berry when it is not?

WAY TOO SWEET in addition. A true mislead and disappointment. Shame on them.

How can they have the audacity to call the teabag 100% Natural Ingredients? What is goji flavor and strawberry flavor? Tastes terrible.

Summary: The closest thing to FRESH GOAT milk
Text:
My poor baby was lactose intolerant and suffered from colics, so I had to give her that soy stuff I won't even touch. When she turned 12-mon/old and thanks to a friend I found Meyenberq... My toddler loves it and after some research I can't believe I didn't try it sooner. I have also tried fresh from the farm goat milk. OMG!!! is hard to get in NJ but totally worth it. I can order it online from a source and boil it at home. Can't get fresher than that. Still love Meyernberq and use it when I need it. It worked out great for our vacation to the caribbean last week!

If you research store bought caw milk you will be disgusted at what you are drinking, specially the UHT stuff. Try raw milk. You can get it in Connecticut and NYC. Don't be scared about the bad publicity, that is just another way to use "fear" to manipulate consumers. Be cautious and informed. Visit farms, boil it at home, wash your hands. That's all it takes and if you are really comfortable, drink it raw! so many benefits you wouldn't even believe. ENJOY!
These are really great. You never know what to expect with gluten free products. You can't even tell it's gluten free. Thank you!

I'm not a fan of the UltraLast variety, but Arm & Hammer litter works really well, especially this version.  We have one cat but buy this litter almost exclusively.  We don't empty the litter all that often, so smell control is very important.  Our cat seems to like it and most guests seem surprised to find out we own a pet, so I count that as an A+ performance.

This is the largest bag I've seen, much bigger than what you can buy at Wal-Mart; it will last a long time. Go with the periodic shipment approach to save 15%. That price ends up being a really good deal.
I didn't realize it but my tea wasn't arriving as promptly as suggested. The company also noticed and sent a box out immediately! WOW! I was very impressed!

Summary: Hands down one of the best foods on the market today
Text: I have two Basenjis both of who are under breed weight/size and who have corn allergies. I cannot stress enough how awesome this food has been for them. Their appetites are up, they are putting on weight, they have more energy where their other food (which was also on the Top Ten Dog Foods List) made them sluggish and caused one to lick a hole in herself. This food has given me my girls back and I recommend it highly to anyone who has issues with small breeds with allergies. I could go on and on about the differences but honestly, buy a bag and try it. There is nothing I can say that you won't see for yourself.

Summary: Super Gravy is bowl lickin' good!
Text: Dakota licks the bowl now that we are adding Super Gravy to her kibbles.  Super gravy is like a flavorful "au jus" style gravy for your pet. Try it with your pet if you want to see the bowl licked clean.  Plus we save money since we no longer have to purchase canned dog food.

While I swear by this product and have ordered it several times, I did not find it well packed this time.  Usually it's come in a box, but this time the 6 packs were just jammed into a padded envelope so the actual pockets were smashed....still usable, just not in great shape.  I think the supplier should go back to using a box.
I've ordered this salmon for 5 or 6 times and I will conitue to order it! Every time it goes to my Girlfriend in Vladivostok! It arrives in good time and the queality is just great!

I have always seen this item in the coffee section of my local market so I assumed it was coffee based. After trying it several times it certainly tasted to me like a malty hot chocolate drink. The ingredient lists "instant coffee" and no chocolate so it is coffee after all - I was fooled.
I found the taste overly sweet. The item could of used more of the bitterness of the coffee to tone down the sweetness. Nonetheless the item was a pleasant drink on a cold day but nothing out of the ordinary.

I use treats for obedience and agility classes.  I need a treat that is not crunchy, but chewy and capable of breaking up into small bits.  This product is easily broken up...too easily.  It reminds me of a thin layer of chocolate but does not melt as such. The selling point is the natural dehydration, rather than freeze dried.  I did not find it useful for my purpose.
Great product. Used the tea for a mother- daughter holiday tea and it was a hit. Would order this tea again

Looked and looked all over for this product in the form of cubes for several years now. Was always able to buy the cube form in the supermarkets until it was discontinued many years ago. I would add some of the fish bouillion cube when making fresh fish broth for fish soup, I would put a little bit of the cube when making white clam sauce and when making fish stews. The bouillion would add more flavor to whatever it was I was cooking. Making stew and clam sauce without the cubes, the flavor wasn't the same, definitely something missing. Because there was no fish cube bouillion to be had anywhere I stayed away from making any of these tasty dishes, knowing that the dishes  would not taste the same. One day I finally had enough, I wanted clam sauce, I decided I would look on Amazon and see if the product would be available there. Why would it, I looked on the Knorr website to see where I could purchase the product in my area, answer.....NO WHERE,  I've also gone to many international markets in and out of my area, and NOTHING. So I was not hopeful I would find it on Amazon. What I did find was the powder form in a large container. I didn't care how large the container,  I know it will last me forever so I will be giving some to family members. After receiving bouillion in the mail, I made white clam sauce with fresh littleneck clams and I couldn't have been happier to add a little of the fish bouillion powder mix to the clam sauce. The clam sauce is once again amazing in flavor, you know, that special little something! FAMILY AND I ARE HAPPY ONCE AGAIN!!!!

I recently gave up my major 20 year Diet Coke addiction.  I did it for a number of reasons.  I typically wake VERY early to hit the gym before work & needed something to help me wake up at 4:30 AM.  This product is GREAT.  No over-stimulation as it only has the caffeine equivalent of 1 cup of jo. It is also SUGAR FREE and has 0 Net Carbs!! I do feel the energy quickly & it lasts the 5 hours it claims.  The berry flavor is pleasant, but tart so I drink some water as a "chaser" (no pun intended).  I drink water the rest of the day & only use 1 in the morning unless I have a "late" meeting scheduled.

The product I ordered was fine; the price, vis-a-vis supermarket, was excellent! Delivery time, great.

BUT what I ordered was a 6-units-for-the-price grocery thing. What I got was a single unit, NOT the 6.

When I called about this, the mistake was corrected immediately, so that was good. And I got to keep the single unit I received FREE. That was nice.

Still, you may have a picking-and-packing problem in the dog-treat division. Any ideas on how to avoid this? The order form doesn't supply any alert mechanism. SO I GUESS THE PICKER JUST HAS TO READ THE ORDER MORE CAREFULLY?

Summary: Very good salt for a very good price
Text:
I'll certainly be a repeat customer. I had a tough time finding large salt crystals to refill a grinder, but this fit the bill nicely.

Flavor is clean with slight minerality. The color is not a deep as some other himalayan pink I've seen, but it's a very good finishing salt, and a good conversation piece when put on the table in a clear grinder.

Also, the seller included a coupon for a future purchase in the package, which was a nice bonus.

I used to make a trip to Whole Foods every few months to stock up on these, but it was much easier and cheaper with Amazon.  My 4 year old loves these bunnies and my husband takes a box to work!  This is the tastiest fiber filled cracker and HELLO they are disguised as cute bunnies!

Summary: Pretty good if you like the flavor.
Text: Vitamin Squeeze was very easy to use.  It gives you Vitamin C with no calories.  The mixture uses sucralose as the sweetener.
