Summary: Its The Best Quality So Far
Text: I have been using Spectrums brand for a year now. I use it for hair, cooking, oil pulling, as a body moisturizer, and as a air fresher in my oil burner. Recently I made the mistake of trying other brands. I will never do that again. I'm from the islands so I know the true quality of unrefined coconut oil. I promise Spectrums Unrefined coconut oil is honestly the best quality, texture, and organic scent. I will never venture out again.

Summary: Fancy Feast from Amazon is best
Text: My little kitty cats, well maybe I shouldn't say little as my Maine Koon weighs 25 pounds, but my sweet little spoiled darlings will only eat Fancy Feast and in particular, salmon and shrimp grilled.  Sometimes they will eat other Fancy Feast but this one is their all time favorite.  And believe me, they know how to get what they want.  The auto delivery is wonderful from Amazon because I don't have to go shopping and lug cat food home.  Great.  Sharon Dalrymple

Let me start here by admitting that we have 5 cats that live with us now (I know, don't even ask it's a loooong story). I've always been a big fan of the Fancy Feast and recently the fishier varieties of the Aristocats soft foods. On occasion I will purchase Friskies but honestly I just can't stand the smell of the latter, even if the kitties just love it.

Just for a fun little test I decided to put three cans out, to see which was favored by my cats (Fancy Feast, Aristocats and this Petite Cuisine). Well, long story short, they gobbled this brand up, quick as quick before moving on to their usual favorites.

This brand looks and for the most part smells similar to canned tuna, one of them even has tiny whole shrimp. Bonus!! They eat it all up, so no kitty food sitting in the bowl when they are done. It is made from quality ingredients, not full of ash (like some), has added vitamins and the texture & smell that the cats really enjoy. I admit that quality cat food has gotten a bit on the expensive side but, this isn't bad at all considering the prices of the other comparable brands. All in all my kitties really enjoyed this food & I will certainly be back for more.

This drink should get ZERO stars.

My husband and I recently purchased the Tassimo Suprema machine. We mainly drink cappuccinos, but we were excited about some of the other drink options. To add variety to our selection, we tried the Twinings Chai Latte T discs. I was the first one to taste the chai latte. I looked at my husband immediately and remarked, "It tastes like it has Splenda in it!" We were both incredulous at first, but then he tasted it as well. It did taste like it had Splenda. I took the packaging out of the garbage and read the ingredients of the Twinings Chai Latte. To our very severe disappointment, the very last ingredient was sucralose. My husband and I detest Splenda - it has an awful aftertaste and it gives us headaches. We are extremely disappointed that Tassimo/Twinings decided to put Splenda in the Chai Latte recipe. We did not purchase our Tassimo system because we wanted low calorie drinks - and if the product contains Splenda IT SHOULD CLEARLY SAY SO ON THE PACKAGE. Furthermore, we are perplexed why, if this one product contains Splenda, there is no other Chai latte option. Why in the world would someone want to spoil the wonderful taste of Chai with a manufactured sugar substitute like Splenda? If customers ASK for a low calorie substitute, it should definitely be made available. But why make your only version "low calorie?"

We cannot bring ourselves to finish the rest of the package that we purchased - it tastes so awful. We're very disappointed that the money we spent on the package of Chai Latte T discs was wasted. If we had seen on the packaging that it contained Splenda we would not have purchased it - we automatically assume that the sweetener is not artificial unless the label indicates otherwise - all customers do.

Of course, if you don't mind the taste of Splenda then you might really enjoy this drink. Otherwise, spend your money on something else - and make sure you read the ingredients before you buy it!

These were really good. I didn't really taste any peanut butter which is why it didn't get 5 stars. Also it's a little pricey. But for snack or breakfast they are really quite satisfying. And since it's all natural and gluten free they are great for anybody.

Summary: Dogs get bored with treats, they like variety, too
Text: This bucket of assorted dog treats is a real hit at our house.  Full of muscle chews, pizzle sticks, sausage treats, jerky, both beef and chicken, etc.  I can grab a handful, throw it around the house, and dogs are entertained for hours of chewing pleasure.  Best of all, they're low-fat.
Of the several brands I've tried this is the best one. It has a richer vanilla flavor than any other. Great in coffee or egg creams :-)

I can't/won't feed this to my own dogs because of food allergies, and there's the mysterious "animal fat" and "animal digest" in this ingredient list which makes me a little nervous about which animal it came from. Really, the ingredient list is terrible, it's a bunch of leftover food waste products made into dog food. Beef is the first ingredient in the list, but when you add up all the forms of soy, corn, and wheat in the ingredient list, there's more junk in this dog food than beef.

*BUT*, my family's dog is a picky eater and this Chef Michael's dog food is perfect for her because she's used to treats and flavorful table scraps (bad, bad habit that I don't approve of) and she snubs healthier kibbles. Salt makes this kibble tasty. With the ingredient list, this kibble reminds me of salted kinda-meaty Cheetos, complete with unnecessary food colorings.

For my own dogs, this would be a 1-star food (honestly, I think this is junk and overpriced too for what it is), but this food does have its uses if you don't really mind what's in it and you have a picky dog and need extra flavorings to entice them to eat dry dog food.

Summary: Dried out and hard - threw it away!  How old is your stock?
Text:
Clarification - my review was from gum purchased from "The Candy Company". I have no experience with other suplliers.

DON'T BUY!

Used to love this stuff when we were kids, were excited to find it still available! REALLY disappointed we we opened the first pack to find the liquid center totally dried out and the gum itself hard and old. Open all the packs - same thing. Threw the whole thing away in disgust, should have sent it back for a refund of my $10.

Do you need to review Jell-O? Normally no; but this is a special case.

I ordered one 24-pack of the peach sugar-free Jell-O. Of those 24 boxes, three were empty! No inside envelope, and of course no product.

While Amazon has always made good on any problem I've had, I felt that complaining about three boxes of Jell-O was really not worthy anybody's time. However I did want to write this review so that others might be wary. My suggestion: do as I will do from now on - check all boxes and let Amazon know if their customers are getting ripped-off, and then write your review to indicate the problem. Eventually, the manufacturer will find that bad reviews don't help sales very much.

Was craving grilled cheese and tomato soup and came across this at the supermarket. Delicious. I added a little salt and black pepper but otherwise this soup is awesome. Chunky tomatoes really make this soup a winner. I came to Amazon hoping to get more but at $2.88 a can, might as well get it in store. I paid $2.69.

Summary: Yummy and fun!  A crowd pleaser!
Text: Whenever I have guests over, I offer them a glass of Butterfinger cocoa.  They love it!  It really is fantastic!  My local grocer is no longer stocking this so I was SO happy to find it on Amazon!  Great deal!

Perfect potful packets are a great way to go ... each package is pre-measured to make one full pot of coffee.  No guesswork on how much or little to use.  Creme Brule is an excellent choice and makes a very smooth and delicious drink

Having lived in the Middle East for 10 years, our family loves hummos and we make a lot of it.  This is the best brand I've ever found in the U.S.  I like the taste and the texture of this one, and it mixes wonderfully with the other ingredients.  I found it somewhere locally, then when I went to buy more I couldn't find it again.  Krinos is so much better than all the brands you find in health food stores or supermarkets, and the price happens to be about half of what most stores charge for a similar amount of tahini.  I was delighted to find it on Amazon!

Just a cautionary note: I bought the 50 pack this summer, and just noticed that they packs expire at the end of November 2010. If you are a fast and furious VIA drinker this would not be a problem, but I only drink them at work, etc etc. I actually find a whole packet to be too strong; I prefer to use half a packet per cup, which is cheaper of course, and allows you to justify the occasional splurge on the "real thing".
I love this product...hard to find this flavor in the store and with amazon's great prices and fast delivery...i will keep on ordering...thank you amazon!!

Summary: Good earth-friendly coffee but too much packaging
Text: I am a coffee lover and usually enjoy a strong cappuccino in the morning.  I tried this coffee and was impressed by the aroma and flavor.  It is not too strong but has a good not-too bitter flavor.  I really like the pods - so much less mess but these are all individually wrapped!  I know a lot of coffee pods/packets are to keep in the freshness but maybe organic and fair-trade coffee manufacturers could care a little more about the waste produced from individually wrapped items.  Needless to say, I did enjoy my cup of coffee and would buy this product again.

Summary: Multi Cat Family - All Of Them Love Newman's Own Pet Food
Text:
We switched to Newman's Own dry and wet food several years ago. We have noticed a huge difference in our pets. Yes, we have cats and dogs all who are rescues. Because of their early history, many have health issues. Since switching them to Newman's Own most have leveled out and we spend less time at the Vet. The food cost less in the long run, because of better health for your animals. We also noticed that all of our animals love this product. Some of them like the dry better than the wet and vis-versa. Some of ours where picky eaters and needed to gain weight. Not anymore, they all show up for dinner eager and ready to eat.
My brother-in-law has a 14 year old Siamese who was on Science Diet Food for diabetes. He looked like he was on his last leg, the cat not my brother-in-law. Anyway, we started supplementing his food with Newman's Own and I swear the cat looks 2 years younger. He is more active, his eyes have cleared up, and he has lost weight. The vet is amazed as well, as his sugar levels are better. I am not suggesting anyone use this food as a replacement for what a Vet has suggested. But if you have an animal who is not responding well, it is worth a try to add this product to their diet.

you will love this on your chicken, weither it's on the grill or in a skillet,
you will use it everytime. and you can also use it a season in different chicken dishes.

I bought two cases of the Pecan Shortbread cookies since I can't find them in the grocery store anymore. The other flavors are not so good. These are a great value when you combine with free shipping. They have a very good taste and you wouldn't even guess that they are a gluten free cookie. My shipment arrived unbroken but I have bought in the store and they were crumbs. I love this product.

Of the three Amoretti syrups I've ordered, this one is the least appealing. I can't quite put my finger on it -- it's not bad, but the flavour profile and aftertaste are a little off. The caramel and vanilla syrups are excellent, though, and I plan on trying the hazelnut one too. Higher-quality overall than Torani's offerings.

Until recently, Johnnie Walker Double Black was only available in duty free airport stores. About a year ago I purchased my first bottle in duty free. Johnnie Walker has now released this to select liquor stores.

This is very similar to Black Label, but with an added punch of more smoke and stronger more pronounced flavors. It has a much sharper edge than Black Label. This stands up to ice rather well.

Because it was so rare, Double Black developed a mystique. This is a good blended Scotch, but it isn't worth trekking all over to find. If your local liquor store carries it, it is well worth a try.

I happen to like Double Black a bit better than straight Black Label. I'm a big fan of the smokier Scotches, Lagavulin, Scapa, Laphroaig, and others from Islay. I like Green Label a lot more than either Black Label. Of all the Johnnie Walkers, I dislike Gold Label, and, of course, Blue Label is my favorite. One of the primary single malts used in Johnnie Walker blends is Cardhu.

If you can find it, this is a lovely Scotch.

Summary: Why eat out ?!?  This stuff is GREAT !!
Text:
I spent a year living in New Delhi, and developed quite a fondness for Indian food. This is as close as I have *ever* come to recreating the restaurant fare at home. Easy to use, reasonable price, and the quality and taste are VERY VERY GOOD.

Highly recommend.

My 14 year old plus senior dog takes as many meds as a senior owner might and more often than not it was challenging to get her to take the pill.  Not anymore!  She treats the meds as though they are treats thanks to pill pockets.  The product is pliable like putty so one "pocket" can be used for several individual pills. A great, great product!

If you're willing to order FOUR 12-quart packages of this product, presumably you're already familiar with it and don't need a review to validate your purchase decision. My primary purpose in posting this review, therefore, is simply to rebut the previously posted, unfair one-star review which addressed a customer service issue rather than the product itself. Although it's certainly valid to raise such issues, I don't think it should impact the PRODUCT ranking, so I've given this item the five-star rating I believe it rightfully deserves.

That said, I will make a few additional comments.

I ordered this item via "Subscribe & Save" and received it in three days. The FOUR canisters come in a pre-packaged (and sealed) plastic bag marked "Ready for shipping," which would seem to ensure that you'll always get the right amount.

The price was recently reduced, making the per unit cost comparable to what you'll probably find in your local grocery store (assuming you can find this flavor).

If you're a long-time Crystal Light consumer, you'll really appreciate the new, more "user friendly" packaging; the canisters are easier to store, and both the canister and individual tubes/packets (not tubs) are easier to open.

Summary: A fine and sturdy everyday tea
Text:
This is a very drinkable blend of Assam, Ceylon, and Kenyan black teas from PG Tips, one of the UK's most popular brands. Although some California grocery stores (and Cost Plus World Market) stock this tea, I had not tried it until reading helpful reviews on Amazon.

Each PG Tips bag weighs 38 percent more than the Lipton bag (that is available in the USA). As expected, PG Tips makes a stronger brew. Each PG Tips bag has so much tea that I can easily make a 12 ounce mug with a single bag. I drink my tea black, but PG Tips is clearly robust enough to maintain character with milk or sweetener.

PG Tips is a sturdy, straight-ahead blend with more strength than Lipton's. It is a caffeine-rich tea - in part because each bag has more tea than other brands.

PG Tips uses a pyramid shaped bag that allows more room for tea leaves to expand while steeping. Does it make better tea? I don't know, but it is a point of differentiation.

HINT: PG Tips also makes a Special Blend black tea that is only slightly more expensive in stores. I much prefer the Special Blend to their regular black tea. The PG Tips Special Blend is a very hardy and rich breakfast tea. The Special Blend is more sensitive to longer steeping times (I usually steep mine less than 3 minutes), but I find the taste more complex and satisfying.

Cognoscenti typically prefer loose tea. Tea bags contain the less expensive "fannings" or "dust," remains from processing loose leaf tea. And with some others brands of tea (not PG Tips), many people can taste the paper used in the bag.

However, if you like I sometimes appreciate the convenience of bags, I recommend trying PG Tips as a sturdy everyday tea. And, I more strongly recommend their Special Blend as a hardy and rich breakfast tea.

I ordered Splenda online from Amizon. Price was much better than in local store and it was delivered promptly to our door. Thanks for great deal and service.

Rich and Patricia Armstrong Virginia Beach, Va

Summary: Good balance and she likes it
Text: Tender vittles, as colorful as a box of kids' cereal, this really enticing food.  The dog really likes it.  She eats a full bowl and leaves just a little.  True, she's more excited about eating the long-dead fish down at the lake, but I'm definitely more excited about this food.  I haven't served this to her for very long to say whether it affects her health positively or negatively, but I did have a dog whose hair would fall out if he ate corn.  I like that this food has alot of different food groups, not just meat... dogs are omnivorous like humans.  Some dogs don't handle grains well, but if she can handle it well in the long-term, this is probably the food I would choose to keep buying for her.  Except for the food coloring--please--if they love stinky fish, do they care what color the food is?

With so many other glowing reviews, I feel a little ashamed to put my own lukewarm review in. Kashi GoLean Crunch! has 7 whole grains in it, which means puffed rice is mixed with oats and rye and other grains to make clusters. It's naturally sweetened, which is a plus, and it definitely stays crunchy in milk. Really, really crunchy. It has sort of a sweet, oat-slightly-nutty flavor to it, and it's not bad.

However, as I said, I'm not really addicted to it. I prefer Back to Nature Granolas, and as I wrote this review, I became curious as to their nutrition facts. So here is the Kashi measured up against the Back to Nature All-Natural Granola, Apple Blueberry, 15-Ounce Packages (Pack of 6) - measured by 1/2 cup servings. There are definitely more calories in BTN (200 vs. 95), but there's fruit too, which the Kashi GoLean lacks. BTN has slightly less sugar (6 g to Kashi's 6.5g), less salt (20 mg to 47.5 mg) and there's more protein in it (6 g to Kashi's 4.5g). They are equal in the following categories: dietary fiber (4g) and calcium (2%); there's more fat in BTN (2.5g=4% BTN, 1.5g=2.5% Kashi). So there is not a lot of difference between the two.

But as for the taste and the texture? I'd readily take granola any day over the Kashi. I don't like overly crunchy cereals (why buy a cereal specifically named, "Crunch!" right?) and the granola is crisp enough for me. There are fewer sharp edges to stab me in the gums.

I purchased Now! Senior/Light last week in an effort to get one of my Bichon girl's very high triglycerides down.
IT's been a week feeding this food and her triglycerides are back to normal! Also, a bonus is she likes it plain with nothing mixed in, and stool is firm and nearly no smell!

Thanks for a great product!
I love these chips and now the whole family is hooked on them. These are the only chips I eat

I really enjoy this Green Tea. Has great taste and not too strong. I see others have found this bitter but that is not what I find.  I love Green Tea more than any other tea but sometimes it is hard to find in the K-cups.  Have been using various green teas for years and I find this to be one of the best!  It is currently available on Subscribe & Save.

My husband and I eat this every morning and never tire of it.  Leagues better than American oatmeal ... wish we could get somebody here to start milling oatmeal this way.  We call our morning bowl the oatmeal souffle.  Not gluey.  Light and delicious.  I adapt the recipe on package to 1/3 cp oat flakes per serving, with one cp water.  Always soak first or cook to boiling at medium.  If you get distracted and it thickens too much add a bit more boiling water, cook a minute or two longer, and serve.  Lowers cholesterol; great source of fiber.
I love orange blossom honey and have a hard time trying to find it... this stuff is DELICIOUS!! Good price, fast shipping. I am very happy with this purchase.

Summary: Review: KIND Nuts and Spices: Madagascar Vanilla no less!
Text:
In the interest of full disclosure...I'm not a huge nut fan. Usually, I will skip brownies, cakes and other items that have nuts in them. I'm willing to eat them by themselves but I find they kind of ruin other thing people stick them into. Further, I'm trying to lose weight and usually nuts can be a good way to go.

The KIND Nuts and Spices nut bars are part of the KIND Healthy Snacks line. They are very upfront about pointing out the use of only 5 grams of sugar (or less) and nothing artificial. further internet research shows that they keep the sugar levels low by using spices. In this case, its Madagascar vanilla.

The bars are very tasty, not too heavy and rather filling for what volume they take up. They are a little sticky (the plastic wrap they come is is surprisingly strong) and the bars themselves really do taste well for the amount of sugar.

I will point out that the bars I had boasted 16g of fat, 14 g of carbs, 5 g dietary fiber and 7 grams of protein. From Weight Watchers standpoint, that's 6 points. Having said that, I could see one of these bars being a decent substitute for a meal so from that standpoint, its cheap points wise.

All in all, the bar is pretty good...I'm glad I got them and I will buy more!

Summary: A Horse Is a Horse Is a Snack, Of Course
Text:
My dog is constantly out to get me. Keeping little miss 'Princess Paws' from rooting through the trash, diddling the carpets or wrecking the house is like trying to keep Lindsey Lohan out of dive bars, crack dens and paparazzi mug shots. In other words -- nearly impossible.

But lord help me, I try.

I bought a bag of these biscuits, thinking I could coax the mutt into good behavior through 'positive reinforcement'. Though the idea sort of fizzles when the dog is too finicky to eat the stupid things. She gave the tiniest of disinterested exploratory sniffs, then scrunched her furry little schnozz like I was offering her a handful of barf-encrusted crap.

(Which, based on her previous dietary choices, she would actually eat. Tasty baked tidbit? No, thanks; I'm trying to keep my greyhoundish figure.

The poop du jour in half-digested BLEEEH-rnaise sauce? Mmmm-mmmm! Bon appeturd!)

I tried to entice her, but she wasn't having it. I even tried a little nibble myself, to prove I wasn't trying to poison her. (Yet.)

And actually, the biscuit was pretty good. It's got a nice crunch, with a taste somewhere between a heavy water cracker and reconstituted horse meal. But pretty light on the 'horse meal' part. All in all, not bad. I'd give it about a four on the people-food scale -- somewhere between a stale bag of Funyuns and a plain rice cake eaten off a sweaty Clydesdale's back. I finished the first one and had another. Pretty soon I'd gone through half the bag.

So this was a complete waste for the dog. But I found a new snack for TV nights. Now if I'm out of popcorn, I set out a bowl of biscuits and munch away. They're not gourmet. But they're filling, and I'm getting my recommended daily allowance of hoof meat all in one sitting. That's a winner.
Have ordered this before and coming back for more.  A great full flavored decaf with lots of body.  Would not hesitate to order it again. Highly recommended!

What do you think of foodwise when you go camping? well besides the case of beer, you have the dogs and the marshmallows! Nothing like roasting these suckers over an open fire, or just pop them in your mouth from the bad. Soft, and fluffy, these suckers don't get hard and stale as quickly as other brands do. Definately a great product.

This is a fantastic syrup, with wonderful flavor.  The price is great when you subscribe to the "subscribe and save".  Pure maple syrup doesn't give me sugar highs and lows the way other sweeteners can.  It is said to be a balanced sweetener.  I love it!  My kids love it!

Summary: Excellent as Mini-Donuts - buy only from Amazon Sub & Save for...
Text:
...the best value - another vendor now shows nearly as triple for a 12 pack.

Made as mix - less one egg - milk instead of water - in this:

Sunbeam FPSBDMM921 Mini Donut Maker
Makes a total 8 batches - using only a TEASPOON to avoid overflow as shown in my previous pix upl'd - sooooooooooooooooo very goooooooooooooood - warm and serve with crushed berries [and whipping cream optional] ANY time of the day.

AND even better as a Mini dessert when topped with this: Betty Crocker Rich & Creamy Frosting, Triple Chocolate Fudge Chip, 15.5-Ounce Containers (Pack of 8)

LOVE these potatoes, they're so good & can be made quickly
the finished product is non-lumpy & tastes great
they work in the stovetop or in the microwave just as well
I will be making them again when the weather cools

This is really a great little green tea. The flavor of the green tea comes through even with the sweetness from the gojiberry and pomegranate seeds. Enjoyed this very much hot, and can see that it would be excellant served over ice.

Since Green tea loose leaves can be brewed more than one time, decided to see how it would stand up to a second brewing. The flavors still came through strong so I went for a third brewing and still was very statisfied with the flavor profile.

Excellant loose leaf tea. Will be purchasing more of this in the future.

Summary: SHHH - Don't let them know these are good for them.
Text: My 2 MinPins love these chews. They each get one of the small size every morning after their walk and will drive me nuts until they get them. Their teeth are very clean and their breath doesn't smell either. I buy them by the case from Value Pet Supplies. Really nice people to do business with.

Greenies are the special treat we give our golden retriever and great pyrenee/golden retriever mix.  Greenies are hard enough that our dogs have to chew slowly but not so hard that I feel uncomfortable giving it to them.

Well, thanks to the internet, what was once available at Brick & Mortar stores is long gone. So, amazon it was. These vials were the right price and the right colour glass (I needed clear, NOT amber or blue) so I ordered them, with fingers crossed.

Arrived very, very fast (only days via USPS) and very well-packaged. SCORE!!!! What I'm using them for is sharing extremely expensive spices and flavoured oils (Fiori di Sicilia and White Truffle oil, for example) with friend's who can't afford the full-sized item. These luxury food items last forever because you use them in such small amounts but cost an arm and a leg to buy the original packaging. So, I'm "sharing the wealth" with beloved friends so they can also try these lovely flavours but don't have to spring for the Big Bucks. From oils, to food powders (Vermont Cheese/Vietnamese Cinnamon) to several gourmet salts, these vials are just the right size for my friends to get a good taste and decide if they want or need more, in the larger containers. If they do, I automatically will have future gifts for them which I know they'll cherish rather than go "ick"! LOL

Nice way to share the bounties you have with those you love. <3
My kids love these and I can feel good about giving the Pops to them because they are organic and packed with vitamin C! A must have for any mom!

This quick bread is really easy to make even though it does require extras to be added.....2 eggs and 1/2 cup of melted butter and water.  It cooks up fast and easy and tastes great.  It's a bit on the heavy side...sort of like pound cake with very few poppy seeds but it's truly enjoyable.  I would recommend it for an occassional treat but a lot of butter is used so I wouldn't suggest daily intake of it.  Give it a try, I think you will enjoy it too.

I love a really good dark chocolate, and even more so when it has fruit and nuts in it.  This one is by far the best fruit and nut chocolate bar I've ever had.  Just opening the package the aroma of fruit is splendid - however a square in your mouth is heaven!  So delicious.  I'm hooked.  I know this one's new, I hope it never goes away!
I can not get this product where I live so I always order this from Taylors Market! Awesome service!!! THANKS!!!!!!!

I got these for my chihuahuas and all three of them love them! They seem to be easier to chew than rawhide, and I'm not as afraid of them choking! I wish they had more flavors- but I'm sure they will in time!

My ultra finicky American Eskimo dog, Precious, loves these treats. I buy this brand because they are manufactured in the US not China. Originally I bought the duck jerky PetsMart carried, which was from China and it made Precious extremely ill. Now I only buy treats made in the US or Canada. These particular treats are best for smaller size dogs, big dogs would probably gulp them down instead of chewing them up.
No bitter test even though it makes a strong cup of coffee. Rich and Creamy. will buy again as soon as Amazon start selling it not through the third party.

I love this popcorn.  It's super crunchy and sprinkled with delicious nuts.  I was looking for a low calorie snack and found this.  I'm glad I did.  However, I haven't paid much  attention to its calorie count since it's so good I don't really care.  I haven't noticed any weight gain so maybe it's a good substitute for peanut m&m's, another addiction of mine.

I love tortilla chips, just good ol' fashioned corn chips with salt on them. I was curious as to how these fancy tortilla chips would fare.

Before even tasting these chips, the bag shows that the company is serious about freshness. It's tough and a little slippery; I almost couldn't open it by hand. The chips are little hexagons about 1" in diameter, with the various seeds clearly visible in the chips. While the corn flavor is dominant, the various other elements of these chips really blend well to give them a unique flavor. They're not overly salty - indeed, if I had any quibble, it's that a little more salt would be appreciated.

These chips would be an excellent choice for finger foods for a higher end dinner party, a date, or just an evening when you want to treat yourself.
I love this coffee and I love Amazon.  That being said, Costco sells the exact same item for $33.00.  How can I cheat on Amazon?????

We love these bars at my house. My kids (including 2 picky young children) could eat them all day long if I let them! They're not too fond of the berry flavor but this one, chocolate, is a big hit. They're just the right size to toss into a lunch box too and aren't messy. They're easy to chew too so even my 2 year old can enjoy them.

This bag was a real disappointment. It was tiny. Not just small, but tiny. It did not have a whole lot of candy in it and that seems ridiculous considering the price. I paid $15.83 for both the candy and shipping together (8.49+7.34S). At the local store I could have gotten the same bag for $2.75 (at Vons) and at another store (Albertsons) I could have gotten TWO 48 oz bags (5 times the 18oz size) for the price available here. Do yourself a favor and get something else. This is just not worth the price Candy Corner is asking.

As for the candy itself, this particular mix was disappointing. No Nerds, which is the favorite among all the kids. No Pixie Stix, no Fun Dip, no Runts. It did have a couple of nice ones, but also a couple that no one wanted. And the bottle caps did not taste right and certainly not how they usually taste. If they haven't changed the way they make them, then it is possible they were stale.

I hope this helps you avoid overpriced candy.
This brand of pasta is easy to cook, and taste great. My children can't tell the difference between it and wheat pasta.

My five Cavalier King Charles Spaniels love Wet Noses.  The organic,limited ingredient treats give me peace of mind that I'm providing them safe and healthful ingredients. Buying Wet Noses products through Amazon is more affordable than the pet stores, too.

i've searched high and low for a delicious, healthy, meatless jerky product.  i'm a pescatarian, so tuna/salmon/halibut jerky is great, but super expensive and often incredibly high in sodium.  i found these in the aisles of pcc and absolutely fell in love.  first thing i did was search amazon for them, and here they were!  the price is better, and i knew i would eat these every day.  i take two to work and have at least one at home.  i would recommend these to anyone, carnivore or vegan, looking for a delicious, healthy source of protein.  wow!
My favorite flavor of kind bar.  The dark chocolate is not too sweet and the fruity/nutty textures and flavors really shine.  A very healthy splurge !!!
My dog Alphi loves this healthy treat.  Amazon offers a great price.  I highly recommend this product if your dog is finicky.

Our cat loves this formula.  I'm happy that the primary ingredients are actual meat, rather than grains.  Cats are carnivores, after all.  Our cat has had many less problems with hairballs and weight gain as well.

Summary: My favorite snack that's tasty and nutritious!
Text: Somersaults not only pack in 6 g of protein & 3 g of fiber (a powerful mix), they are also downright tasty!  And the cocoa version - come on.  It satisfies my sweet tooth and gives me nutrition.  Can't beat that.  These have absolutely become our favorite snack, hands down.

I had already tried two Clear Scalp & Hair products and was less than impressed with the results. In fact, I noticed a difference after just one use-and not in a good way.

This product however was much better. The conditioner helped restore the moisture that the Clear Scalp & Hair Moisture shampoo had striped away. I also used the Clear Scalp & Hair Ultra Shea Nourishing Scalp & Hair Oil which added a lot of shine.

I recommend this product to anyone with long hair (long hair is old hair-the closer to the scalp the younger the hair), curly hair or thick & coarse hair because the shea butter adds the moisture that your hair needs but it doesn't make your hair greasy or weighed down. If you have thin or fine hair I would try a volumizing formula instead.

These are great crackers. Yes they are made of seeds and are extremely crunchy. If you don't like seeds why would you buy these (I am pretty sure the description of the crackers is clear)? I like the onion flavor and like other flavors from Mary's Gone Crackers.
Great Coffee ... I like my coffee strong - finally found one that has a wonderful full flavor without the bitterness.

the best tasting dark roast for the Kurieg I can find.

Rev and Revv 2 are a bit too much caffeine aftertaste but they are also worth looking into for that morning when you cant get going.

Summary: Best licorice out there - hands down
Text: These things are $6 a bag in my local grocery store - finding them here for around $4 a bag was a great find. This is the softest, juiciest licorice you'll ever find. I'm addicted to it, and I'm really glad to've found an online source for it.

Orville's is the best microwave popcorn you can buy...in my opinion. The price is outstanding from Amazon and we have compared it all around at various stores. Almost all the kernels pop and we love the movietheatre butter flavor!
Cannot go wrong with this purchase.

Summary: The best basmati rice we've found
Text:
We eat a lot of basmati rice and the Royal brand is our favorite. It has a superior flavor and aroma over the other basmatis we've tried, and the grains cook up so much nicer and fluffier.

To truly appreciate this fine rice, I would highly recommend following the directions to rinse the rice first. It DOES make a difference.

Summary: Try a Box Before Buying a Case - a review of BTN's Mac & Cheese
Text:
I like organic. We do organic milk and meat, and vegetables when we can afford the latter. My children like macaroni and cheese - not my homemade casserole, of course (lol), but out of a box. (Reasons for this preference are unknown.)

In any case, you would think organic *Back to Nature Macaroni & Cheese* would be popular at our house but it's not. Simple put, my children won't eat it.

Perhaps it is because of the lack of chemicals that the cheese sauce comes out a little grainy. Or maybe I just made it wrong, but my testy tikes won't gobble this down like non-organic, over-processed wheat Kraft Mac.

Two Stars. Maybe I just had a bad box. Or maybe I just didn't make it right that day, but my two (boy and girl) would not eat this macaroni and cheese product. If you are going to try it (products do get IMPROVED every day) then my advice would be to buy ONE box and try it; and not a case.

On the recommendation of someone else's review which said this coffee was mild, I chose to purchase a box. It is still stronger than I like. I have to use much creamer and sugar, plus run more water through a second time. Not what i hoped for. Sorry.

Would like a truly mild tasting coffee, there were some in the first sample box I bought, but the next two sample boxes had too many strong coffees and many tea cups. I already have a good selection of tea, etc and only wanted coffee samples. Am not sure how to find a coffee to my taste without a lot of waste.
This is a great way to stock up on produce from out of area. Good deal at a great price.

Excellent cinnamon flavor. It keeps me going all year long especially when Starbucks runs out of my pumpkin spice. It is my favorite flavor and brand. I did have to order it
on-line because I only found it once at a store. It's a seasonal type of an item so on-line works best.
This is the first dog treat I've bought that my dogs actually fight over. They love them.

I had my reservations about this product when I first saw this product.  But being a big fan of Jelly Belly I had to try them.  I've used this product off and on for two years now.  I has helped me recover from training sessions.  Long runs, cross fit sessions, and field exercises that would have left me dehydrated for the day just become "fond" memories after taking one of these packs.  I do not recommend eating these Jelly Bellies unless your body needs the electrolytes, they taste too sweet and salty.

these green tea kit kats are delicious! when it was delivered on friday i didnt wake up early enough to get it so i had to pick it up from the post office on monday. before i put them in the fridge to get cold i had to try one! the chocolate was melted alittle bit to the paper but either way they were good! im gonna buy more when i get some money! thanks!
These came early! Wonderful! WIll order from again! Great in tea! I gave a pack to my grandmother and she loves them too!

My husband was just diagosed with type 2 diabetes.  I am gluten intolerant and my daughter gave me the simply lite bars for Christmas.  My husband is now hooked on them but Wal-mart has discontinued.  We bought all they had.  They are soooo chocolatey - it has saved my husband from his m&m and peppermint pattie addiction.  Hopefully amazon will carry these soon so we can purchase in bulk!!

I have tried many decaf green teas, and this one is my favorite.  Really nice flavor! Next time I will order the 40-bag/6 boxes from Amazon as I am going through the 20-bag/6 boxes too quickly.  Great price too.

This is a tasty bar, but as it contains chocolate it isn't great for all occasions, like a breakfast snack, and to me isn't chocolatey enough to satisfy those type of dessert cravings.
It's still WAY better than other healthy chocolate fruit/nut bars.

I love these bars! They are an excellent snack and taste great wwith a cup of herbal tea. They have more calories (210) than some of the other choices (such as Oskri Granola bars which have 145 calories). But they are well worth the few extra calories. I highly recommend them!
Delivery was good, and the peppers were all whole and in good condition. Pull off the stem and throw in a coffee-type grinder and you're in business.

Summary: Easier to Use than Standard Vacu Vin
Text:
I have used both this product and the standard (cheaper) Vacu-Vin...pay the premium and buy this product, as it is SUBTANTIALLY easier to use.

In addition to being more stylish than the standard Vacu Vin, the stoppers on this product are easier to use and the pumping mechanism "clicks" when you have pumped enough air out of the wine bottle...the standard model just leaves you guessing about how much air has been removed.

Summary: I love Popchips, but I don't love this flavor
Text:
As I write this review, I'm looking at 3 large boxes of Popchips stacked in my living room. I bought 2 of the 3 boxes, which each contain 24 bags of the chips. One of the boxes I ordered is Popchips barbeque flavor, the other is the Popchips Variety Pack and now I have a box of the new Chili Lime Popchips that was provided by the manufacturer for this review.

I am a big fan of Popchips and I've bought them many times. Generally, Popchips are low in calories, low in fat and relatively low in sodium. They make an excellent snack that's a lot better for you than regular potato chips.

Problem is, the chili lime flavor really isn't very good, in my view. There's sort of an off-putting aftertaste to them that I can't just put my finger on. You can taste the lime, although it's a bit stronger than I'd like, and it sort of tastes like bad chili, but I'm not a fan of this variety.

Sure, I'll eventually finish the box, but I wouldn't order them again. So while I love Popchips in general and enthusiastically recommend them, I can't recommend these and give them a 2.5 star rating, which I'll round up to 3 stars mostly because I do like and support Popchips.

I'd recommend avoiding these. The flavor isn't quite right, in my view. My favorite flavor is barbecue followed by plain and the variety pack is a good way to figure out what you like the best. But I cannot recommend Chili Lime Popchips.
Great!  My dogs beg for them.  One won't even finish his dinner because he wants his Nutri Dent.  Much longer lasting than those new formula Greenies.

My chocolate lab puppy is killing this product. His 8 week visit he was 11 lbs and yesterday i took him for his 10 week appt and he is now 16.1 lbs. Thanks pinnacle!

Update dog is now 7 months and still on product he is still loving this food and acts like it is filet everytime.
This is a smooth and fairly mild coffee that has very mild hints of coco berries and marshmallows (not overpowering, just a hint). It's my personal favorite. Love this coffee.

I occasionally add powdered flavoring to try to encourage myself to drink more water.  While I'm not a big fan of green tea flavoring, I do enjoy the tastes of honey, blackberries, and pomegranates.  While that combination of flavors sounds interesting, I really did not enjoy the final result. I think my taste buds were a bit confused.  It might be nice to try this if you love all the flavorings listed, but I will stick to the more basic flavors.

Well, this is frustrating as I really love this product for making decent quality lattes on my home machine. However, this is the second time in a row where the product has arrived damaged with cartons opened/punctured with leaky milk. It is hard to know what caused the damaged cartons as the original box is packed in a larger box with paper around it. I am thinking that because I am an Amazon Preferred customer, the orders are shipped via 2-day air. Maybe the air pressure in flight is causing packaging to fail. Fortunately, Amazon has been very good about dealing with the situation, but as I said it is frustrating not having good soy to make decent foam.

After reading many of the reviews for this instant coffee, I thought I'd try some.  It tastes exactly like every other instant coffee - no better, no worse.  I was expecting more based on the reviews.  I'll keep looking.

I buy three different flavors of KIND bars. These are the ones that disappear the soonest so I have had to double up the order. What's not to like?KIND Fruit & Nut, Almond & Apricot, All Natural, Gluten Free Bars (Pack of 12) They are delicious, healthy, reasonable priced, portable. My husband and my son do alot of strenuous, physical work. They both love KIND bars for the energy they provide. I highly recommend them over most any choice available. In fact I recently gave one to my mailman since he delivers them for Amazon. He loved it too.

Our cat was diagnosed with diabetes.  Our vet prescribed 5 units of insulin.  He was supposed to have his blood checked at the vet's once a month and we were to buy their expensive high protein, high fiber kibbles.  I went on the net and found a book here on Amazon written by Elizabeth M. Hodgkins (she is a vet and an attorney) called Your Cat: New Secrets to a Longer Stronger life.  She recommended home testing, which we did morning and night for about a month, and only fed him Wellness cat food because she said a diabetic cat needs a canned high protein food with no grains and absolutely no kibbles.  We are now testing him once a week and only feeding him Wellness Adult Chicken Canned Cat Food  He has been off insulin with normal blood sugar readings for a little over two months!

Summary: Vanilla wafers -- beware they can melt in shipment!!!
Text: These tasty chocolate coated wafers are a great way to get a chocolate fix without too many calories. Be warned however that if the weather is sunny and in the 70's or higher, you're likely to be disappointed when you open the box because the chocolate melts. You'll have three solid blocks instead of 18 wafers, even if you used next day delivery. Best to order this product when cloudy weather is forecast, and high temps will be in the 60's or less -- apparently those brown UPS trucks get pretty warm in the sun!
Will buy again in the future...my baby girl (11 months) loved it! Great thicker food for babies learning to eat chunkier textures.

KIND PLUS Pomegranate Blueberry Pistachio bars are very delicious.  I enjoy one bar and a glass of orange/carrot juice every morning.  Dr Oz recommends that you eat protein within the first hour after waking; you will get protein from this bar.  I really love the fresh taste and texture.  2012 UPDATE: I usually get bored with food, but not these bars!  I still have my juice and this Pom/Blue/Pistach bar every single morning for breakfast.  I don't kind-a-like KIND, I totally love it!!!
Sent this to my mom for Mothers Day - she got a limp 3-color arrangement that was far from the photo! I won't do that again!

Wonderful pretzels! I purchased these last summer in New Hampshire which started an addiction that has been hard to fulfill because I can't find these pretzels in Missouri. Hence my online purchase. A really good pretzel that's not overly sweet, and packed with flavor.

I enjoy many types of tea, the more flavorful the better. I received this in a sampler that I purchased and did not find it to be very good. It has a very oily taste to it. I will finish off the tea bags that came in the box but would not purchase this type again.
This is the best coffee I have ever had.  I love Senseo pods. My seller was excellent from packaging to mailing.  5 Star!!
I sprinkle a little of this on my dogs kibble or use as treats while training, and she loves it. Nikita, 60# Husky Shepherd mix.

After years of dealing with increasing price of soda, finding place to store it and returning empty bottles decided to give this a try. We bought ours at Costco which came with 1-130L Co2 Carbonator, 2 1-Liter Stainless Steel Bottles and trial flavors pack for $99. First let me say I'm very pleased, the flavors are not bad at all and i can use my own filtered water from either the fridge or Pure faucet attachment and no longer need to pay or bring back bottles for the deposit. They also have much less sodium than store bought soda with the exception of Diet Rite.

I have tried many diet flavors and the ones i like the best are Orange, Caffeine free cola, dr pete, Fountain Mist, Cream Soda and Root Beer. As for the cost it has changed everything, no longer have to pay deposit, return empties or search for sale price on soda which means lot less trips to the store saving me from impulse buying and gasoline usage. I can now make fresh bottles of soda whenever I need it (unlike store bought soda which can lose carbonation) and any flavor I feel like at the time. Already used up 1- 130L Co2 carbonator bottle so ordered 1 full bottle + 1 exchange for empty bottle from SodaStream web site this way I'll always have one full bottle when one is done. You should always search the web for coupons for any online store before ordering and SodaStream is no exception, saved $15 which is the price of the license on a new bottle. So it cost me the same as if ordering to exchange 130L Co2 Carbonators, pretty sweet. If you order 10 bottles of syrup at a time you get one free and with on line coupons and cashing in points your earn from them with every purchase can save you more than just the shipping cost, the cost of a trip to the store. For me the SodaStream is well worth the cost.
So glad these are available!! Not having to go out to get a french vanilla cappuccino is great! We love these!
I absolutely love this stuff,i use it for my hair and i no longer have any frizz and i am totally in love with this product.

I bought this item for my hair. I've never eaten nor smelled coconut. So I thought what the hay let me try it. I thought it would be a pleasant smell, but in reality I can't stand it. It seriously makes me want to gag, throw up & die. Okay that's a little exaggerated but SERIOUSLY. It makes me super nauseous & gives me a head ache when I inhale it. I have to mix it with other hair products to ease the smell.

On the other hand, this product really has made my hair a little more manageable.

BTW a little about me:

-Female
-18-26 years old
-hispanic
-curly, fine, dry hair
-a lot of split ends
-washed daily
-takes half a year to grow an inch of hair (seriously)

I bought this product to make my hair less dry, & to help it grow and become healthy

So far ive been using it 2 times a week for 3-4 hours & it leave my hair soft to the touch.

Summary: By Nature is dog thumbs up!
Text: My local pet supply store had By Nature on sale, as he'd gotten a special shipment. My dogs love all the favors and I especially like the teeth cleaning variety. Problem is, these are getting harder to find.
my furry kids just LOVE these,cant keep for long,both prefer these Temptations to anything else. Yummy for the tummy,is a must buy

Summary: Fantastic (&Healthy) even for the Finicky Feline
Text: I feed my 3 boys only all natural foods (both dry and wet).  I will even cook for them on occasion.  One of my cats, however, is so incredibly picky, I have gone through countless types/brands of treats and everything to find something he likes but for the last 5 years he will only eat his dry food.  UNTIL NOW!! This is the first canned cat food that he absolutely savors.  I was amazed and pleased to see him get excited when I open the can and lick his bowl clean.  It makes it much easier to maintain a healthy feeding schedule with all of them and I am exceptionally pleased with the results thus far.  Thank you and PLEASE get more in stock!!

Summary: Alternative if you are trying to cut sodas/colas
Text:
If you are already drinking healthy/natural/organic beverages, as many other reviewers have pointed out, this has a number of artificial ingredients, so you probably want to stay away from it.

On the other hand, if you are like me and are or have or had been trying to cut back and eventually cut completely the soda and cola addiction, this can be helpful because it is not addictive like the Colas and it is very quick to prepare, so you can counter the cravings (for worse things) before they build up. It only takes a couple of seconds to squirt a little in a glass of water and then add ice if you prefer. I do only one squirt per drink, press and release, not press and hold. It is small enough you can take everywhere.

The taste is reasonable considering what it is and what I use it for. It obviously tastes nowhere near as good as fresh peaches or freshly brewed tea.

Having said that, I only use this occasionally to counter cravings and such. I don't think it is a good idea to drink this on a daily basis. But if it can stop you from running to the soda vending machine at work or grabbing a 2-liter cola from the convenience store, it is a small victory.

Let me begin my review by stating that I have been a Helmann's mayonnaise devotee for the better part of my lifetime. I have tried many other brands, mainly out of curiosity, and found all of them inferior. Recently, a friend recommended Blue Plate brand. To be honest, I had never even heard of Blue Plate Mayonnaise. To my surprise however, on a recent trip to my local Publix, there it was, in an unassuming blue, yellow, and red container, tucked away on the bottom shelf. Given my frequent disappointments, I was skeptical to say the least.My fears were soon put to rest, however.
Upon first taste, I immediately thought of Helmann's. Blue Plate had a nice, slightly acidic tang that I was familiar with. There was no sweetness whatsoever. The Blue Plate had a nice clean aftertaste, and no heavy off-oil flavor, common to many lesser brands. (Even the much vaunted Duke's brand, which I tried with high expectations, let me down in this department. It tasted heavily of cheap oil.) While the taste is very similar, where Blue Plate is leaps and bounds ahead of Helmann's is in the texture department. For those of you who have ever made home-made mayo, you are familiar with the wonderful, velvety texture that is created. There is a nice sheen, and a good white (not yellow) color. Blue Plate reminded me of this exactly. Unlike Helmann's, there is no "whipped" thing going on here - very little air in the mixture, which added to the outstanding, home-made experience. I can see why Blue Plate has been a staple in Cajun Kitchens for the better part of a century.
For those of you who take your Mayo seriously, I strongly recommend Blue-Plate. I really believe you will not be disappointing.

I have been chewing this gum for years now. The flavor lasts for a decent amount of time, about an hour or so. The gum's consistency and texture is perfect, it's chewable for a very long time. The best part is that it is aspartame and sugar-free.

This was a re-order of the pods which are very good.  Ordered three boxes and gave them to friends because I told them it was great.  Only later found out that "instant coffee packets" of the product had been substituted.  UGH!  Big let down .. will go to BB&B for purchases next time.

I read about this flavored tea on a food blog and was immediately interested in trying it. I now have to avoid sugar and sweets as much as possible, meaning having to give up my favorite type of cookie - sugar. I found the tea at Target and have to say it is very good. No, there is no texture of a sugar cookie, however the taste does have a definite effect on your, as one rater noted, senses. If you enjoy sugar cookies, but would like a calorie free treat perhaps this is for you.

I have been using Coffee-Mate creamer, bought from grocery store's refrigerator section for the past 12 years. Since I was moving to Berlin, and you cannot fine it in Germany I bought 6 boxes of these and took them with me. I could not use even one, since they taste nothing like the ones you buy from the store. I was very disappointed, and will not recommend you to spend your money on this item.
This coffee is excellent! Strong enough without bitterness.  Cost at Sams here in Texas is 38.00 so it much cheaper

Other reviews I read warned of having too many of one type in the box.  Not true in my case - the box had a very nice variety of teas.  there were a couple that had duplicates but that was kind of wahtI was expecting.  I am very satisfied with this transaction.

Summary: Addictive, but buy at Costco for half the price.
Text:
One can buy this same 2 lb bag at Costco for 10.00!
Usually Amazon has the best deals, but not for this item. If you are buying for the
health benefits of Gogi berry, it's really a great dark chocolate, with kind of a
gummy bear textured fruit mix.

I ordered these awhile ago like under a year ago but allmost a year ago. and when they came to me by ups i was suppose to get 12 of them in the box it came in i only got 7. And i called amazon on this and they were very nice to me and gave me a refund. And i got to keep all 7 bags of the cashews and they were very good. I'd prolly get them again but this time i hope id get 12 this time lol.
What's not to love? It's organic, no sugar added, and it's in convenient 4-ounce serving cups. You just chill in the fridge, peel off the foil lid and enjoy!

I expected to recieve a box of Greenies, which is why I ordered this.  I thought that it would be a nice and neat way to store them.  Instead what I recieved was a bubble bag full of individually wrapped greenies.  Not neat and easily stored at all.  The picture of this item shows a box, but I did not recieve a box of greenies.  I wish I would have just ordered the bag of greenies, with the ziploc top, at least that is easily stored.  My dog also has a sensitive stomach and food allergies, even though greenies don't have corn in them he still pukes them up and doesn't seem interested in them when I try to give him one.  My larger dog has the bigger size and he likes them just fine, so I guess it just depends on your dog.  My main complain about this purchase was that I didn't recieve the box of greenies that is described.  Maybe they ran out and just threw 45 individually wrapped greenies in a bubble mailer, either way, that was disappointing.
No need for sugar just right I eat daily and very delicious.  It has the flavor of the topics with the vanilla. I can always trust Kashi for no corn syrup or hydrogenated so far

My 1 and 3 yr old boys brought these home from day care.  My husband and I tried them and ate them all up!  I'm not really a pretzel fan but these don't taste so "yeasty" and actually have a slight sweet flavor.  The 1oz bag is a perfect size; you get a lot in this one bag!  Really good and am looking to buy these to take to work for a healthy snack.

the product arrived undamaged. they are fresh and delicious. the price is good and it is nice having them delivered to my house. i really like the unfrosted pop tarts the best. i think the crust or pastry shell part is really good. they are worth a try. i am happy that i tried them out.

This tea is something different for the tea lover looking for a non-caffeinated herbal tea. It's ok, but a little like a watered down chocolate drink. It's ok, and I'll finish it, but I don't think I'll buy it again after all my boxes run out, whenever that is.

As wine lovers say, this coffee has "nose". I serve this to customers in my salon who adore the aroma and the taste.  Imagine, the taste and smell of a morning chocolate treat without extra calories. What's not to love?

Summary: five star coffee at a one star price
Text: It's no surprise that there are so few reviews on Amazon for this coffee. While it is one of my favorite bold coffees, probably as good as Timothy's dark roasts (generally $19.00 to $23.00 on amazon in a similar pack); this price, in bulk, is fully 20 cents a serving higher than the 12 pack in my local grocery store. Don't buy it here!

Summary: My kids love these raisins and all!
Text: These cookies are a great quick snack for the kids. They did not even complain about the raisins, I think they gobble them up before they even notice!
This product wasn't what I expected it wasn't spicy at all and didn't have a smokey flavor either it had a super light regular store paprika flavor.

I used to use BSN NO-XPLODE-Nitric Oxide Creatine, 2.25 lbs Fruit Punch (50 Servings), but after a few months it seemed harsh and left me feeling jittery, even at half strength. I've used other Labrada products and liked them so decided to try this, and after nearly a year I'm still liking it. I usually use it at half strength. I won't make any ridiculous unfounded claims, but for myself I feel it's great before and during intense cardio and helps my endurance. I've taken it on mountaineering expeditions for the ascent, and found it works great for that as well. YMMV.

Summary: The BEST espresso I've had from a simple machine
Text: I've always equated cost and complexity with espresso - the more complicated and overpriced the machine, the better the taste. No longer. While the individual capsules aren't cheap (about .70 cents each), the machine is well priced at $400. We go through at least 3 cans a month. Each and every cup is perfect!!! The crema is rich and long lasting. No bitterness. Smooth, rich, and delicious...

Summary: These are being taken off the market
Text:
My little Lhasa loved these, but she threw up big balls of starch. Apparently, this is such a common problem, Zuke's is soon taking this line off the market and releasing a new replacement product in the next few months. Small dogs don't have the digestive track needed to process these. They will be switching from the existing potato formula to a more digestible Tapioca line.

I need to hand it to Zuke's though. I told them about the product, and they rushed to send me samples and refund my money.

Summary: These are the low-cal rice cakes!  Light and crispy!
Text: Our grocery store stopped carrying these, instead opting for a "local" brand that is twice as dense, and twice the calories.  These Koyo rice cakes aren't as fresh as the ones I used to be able to buy in our store, but I spread them out on a flat pan and leave in the oven on "Warm" for about 5 or 6 minutes.  Then I let them cool completely, and put them back in the bag, and store the bag in the freezer.  This way, they taste very fresh.  I just leave the big shipping box up on a storage shelf, and take out the individual bags one by one to crisp them as I need them.

These fruitsnacks are the ONLY ones I will give my child since they are the healthiest I've found. The added bonus is that they aren't as sticky/gummy as normal fruitsnacks, which can get caught in teeth and cause cavities. Being a Dental Hygienist and a Mom, I'm always on the lookout for teeth friendly snacks.
My 17month daughter has been given these from before she turned a year old due to the fact that they're very easy to chew.
I buy them at Target for much less than on Amazon. I just came on here to see if I could find them in bulk a bit cheaper than that. :)

We were so happy to find the sour hard candies on line. My guy just loves them and the stores seem to stop carrying them. We were so finally happy to find them here and be able to order them without any hassles.

The beignets from the cafe du monde are really delicious. Very difficult to do better. also the price is reasonable.

I would recommend.

Summary: Fantastic morning snack or breakfast on-the-go! LOVE Ella's!
Text:
These organic breakfast pouches sell out FAST at the store, and with good reason!

We love these breakfast pouches-- they are portable, sized perfectly for kiddo hands, and offer a perfect, wholesome start to the day. All organic with 100% natural ingredients, no pesticides, no chemical fertilizers, no genetic modifications, and no preservatives. The pouches themselves are are BPA and phthalate free.

Each pouch holds a serving of organic fruit puree, natural yogurt and brown rice. The combination is tasty, satisfying, and gives kiddos a boost in the morning. We also occasionally use these as a "Dessert" at the end of the day.

You will be happy with this purchase!

If you like candy and coconut then you need to look no further.  This is the candy for you.  I bought some and put it out for friends, first timers to peach buds and they thought the same.  They immediately wanted to know where to get more.

It does come all sticky inside, I guess from humidity or whatever else. Thus far I have bought over 18 packs of it, and they all were the same inside, grains sticking to each other. Not that it matters though right? You will put it into your tea or foods and down your throat it goes!!!

I'd purchased these based on the reviews here and their reputation abroad. A delightful little tea-time/anytime snack, these little cookies do remind you of graham crackers in taste, but they're not as sweet and have a slight baking soda aftertaste that remind me of Violet Crumbles. The consistency is course grain but crumbly. In your mouth, the cookie falls apart into small crumbs like what you'd find on a graham cracker pie crust.

Amazon did a wonderful job in shipping. I know a lot of people have stated that theirs came in crumbled, but almost none of mine were broken. Mine arrived as a box inside a box and had bubble wrap and tacky tape that tried to keep each roll stationary. But another reason for their good condition might have been that they didn't have to stay in transit long. It looks like mine came out of Florida, and they were delivered to South Georgia. Either way, I'm extremely satisifed with the quality and shipping of my purchase.

I have been feeding cats for a long time, and this is the best quality best tolerated food yet. My cats love it. Their digestive tracts aren't distressed, and the ingredient list alone would sell it. No aritificial colors or preservatives. You will feel good about giving this food to your pet(s).
Wonderful tasty coffee with a nice aroma as it is brewing. There is no after-taste at all and it very satisfying, you always want another cup of coffee. I continue to buy it.

this baby food is the greatest.  My granddaughter loves it and even calls it by name. she is 15 months old and still enjoys it, and I have peace of mind because I know I am feeding her a good balanced meal at a great price

These inexpensive little rewards for dogs seem to be a good quality and very palatable.

I've had problems pleasing my dogs as far as tasty treats, some snacks are just completely ignored.

I've had no problem with my dog accepting these snacks and actually they consume it eagerly and quick, so it passes the taste test.

Sergean't's is an established and trusted name in pet care products and this is a fine product your dog will probably love.

coriander is one of those spices that i found out about a few years back.  it's a mild spice that adds a distinct flavor to many dishes, but is difficult to locate in large quantities.  this is the second purchase of coriander in the last 18 months.  at stores, you can usually find an ounce or two for about half the price of this package.  great product, great vendor and great value.

Love beef jerky! Have tried many and this is good stuff. It has enough heat without being harsh. This is the first time I have tried Buffalo Bills, and my son and I really like it. Fast shipping and really good packaging. Nice and tender beef. We will be buying more. Try it!

We used to buy this in the store, but, for some reason they stopped selling this in our area.  Well, I was happy to find it on Amazon.  It tastes so much better than most taco seasoning mixes.  If you are looking for something different (in a good way!) give this a try!

Summary: I wouldn't feed this to my dogs
Text: I LOVE, LOVE, love biscotti.  That said this stuff is HORRIBLE..not really boscotti.  It tastes like old damp then dried cardboard.  I tried dunking it in coffee..again damp the dried cardboard.  I am a diabetic and was hoping against hope that this would be good...not great..but at least good.  I say I was disappointed is a gross understatment..NEVER AGAIN
Read your labels, people!!! SMART bones are made in China!!!!!! A neighbor told me how great these were. After buying them, I read the fine print in the back. "Made in China!!"

I am new to the Superfood concept, and this is one of the first products I've tried.  It is excellent!  It mixes well with anything I happen to dream up, and I found it easy to substute entire meals with my gree smoothies.  I usually start with some organic tea, add ice cubes, Superfood,  then my "special" juices.  I vary between Acai, Mangosteen, and Noni.  And then I also add protiem powder, because I've found that my energy level takes a big dip if I don't suppliment all the green stuff with some protien.  Sometimes I put in a bit of plain yogurt and honey to smoothe it out a bit, but it's not necessary.  I find that I'm sipping on my "green shakes" all day long.  Great stuff!

None of my local stores carry organic smoked paprika, so I was happy to find it on Amazon. I was able to choose the amount that I wanted, it arrived very quickly and it was exactly as it was described.  If you can't find organic smoked paprika locally, I would recommend ordering it from Amazon.
The coffee good for a quick cup in the morning.Easy to fix,and clean up after.enjoy a cup in the morning.
My teenagers who are very hard to please simply LOVE this stuff.  Will order again and again.

Summary: If you do not want expired product, DO NOT ORDER FROM BURBANK :"OTTOS (EUROPEAN) FOOD STORE".
Text: The item arrived in January 2012, with expiration date of NOVEMBER 2011. After few emails with dismissive statements like :"the chocolates are still good for several months after the sell by expiration dates", I decided to accept 50% discount. I have suspicion that this was not a innocent mistake, because the bottoms of all 10 packages look like rubbed off so that the expiration dates were very faint. I was not happy with how the matter was handled and did not appreciate the attitude of representative, which I did expressed in my "Sellers feedback". Today I received 2 PHONE CALLS - first to me, but after I refused to discuss anything by phone, my husband , who picked up second call minutes later (which I see as harassment !!!), had to listen the threat that if i would not remove my review, they will set the lawyer on me !!! I do have my phone companies record for that. I never heard of so offensive handling of complaint !!! I do not want anything from this company <<Otto's Euopean Import Store>>> and will not buy from them in the future. All of a sudden the page here has different seller.

Summary: Just about my favorite K-Cup coffee so far
Text: Got a Keurig for Christmas, so I've been having fun trying the wide variety of available K-Cup products.  So far, this is my favorite of all the coffees, and one of the few I'd stack up against a good cup of freshly ground and brewed regular coffee. Usually I like K-Cups because they're convenient.  I like these because they're truly excellent coffee and taste wonderful.  These and Coffee People's extra bold varieties are good enough to pass for the real thing - no one would ever suspect they were K-Cups if you didn't tell them.

Summary: Satisfying with just enough of a tang to make your mouth water
Text:
If you're like me, you try to steer clear of colas and especially anything with high fructose corn syrup, yet you're a bit nervous of the calorie count from, say, orange juice, and you like a bit of sparkle to your drinks, as well. When I saw IZZE, it looked like the ideal solution. It's got a bit of fizz, real fruit juices, and a few vitamins. At 80 calories per 8.4 oz can, it won't break your diet, and it doesn't have any high fructose corn syrup.

So, how does it taste?

Actually, it's pretty good. The pomegranate flavor gives it a nice tang without being overwhelming. The carbonation is light, just enough to give the drink a bit of extra zip without being threatening to overwhelm your stomach. And IZZE is sweet enough that I can enjoy it as a sort of reward for a workout, without being sticky or overly-sweet the way some traditional soft drinks can be.

As a test, I tried one can at room temperature--it's a test I won't repeat. But served nicely chilled and straight out of the refrigerator or over ice, IZZE is an enjoyable treat--without completely busting the calorie count.

Our terrier mix adores Greenies (haven't met a dog who doesn't love them, actually)... they kind of have a gummy-bear quality. We give him one before we leave for work so he has a little distraction (only takes him a few minutes to finish one). These are $1.50/ea at our local pet supply store, so buying them in bulk is the way to go. We bought them from Entirely Pets and got a great deal with fast shipping.

There is no question that with gourmet food, you would expect it to be a great buy at a exquisite price. for Wine.com, they have made some really great products over the past several years. For me though, I would expect them to make a great gift basket for exciting and luxurious lovers of food. Well, they have tried with their gluten free snack basket. The idea isn't such a bad one. Yet you do get what you pay for. The only problem is that you would expect more. While I do enjoy the taste of the pecans and the cracked pepper potato chips. You really would expect it to be less in price for what it is worth, but there could have been much more in the way of food. Still, if you are looking for a nice present for a loved one or a moment of joy, that try Wine.com's gift basket.

Price: C

Taste: B-

Overall: C+

I have a lot of free time while I'm sitting in motels. I like taking these old crime shows with me because I can simply watch one show, or several. Joe Penny is great in almost everything he does.  The Fatman adds a little humor to the crime show.
way to sweet..taste like hot sugar water..has no coffee back ground taste..sorry that i bought it..nothing like what you get in a coffe shop..waste of money

I just tried orange spice tea for the first time on a recent trip to Hawaii, and they had a tea chest of varoius Stash teas in the lobby for people to try. So I deceded to try a flavor I had never had before and I was pleasantly surprised. Now orange spice tea will always remind me of Hawaii. I bought a box of Bigelow Constant Comment, which is another orange spice tea, but it wasn't as good as Stash's, im my opinion. Stash has much more flavor, and isn't that the point?

plus I gained about 20 pounds! but it worked - have a crave and pop a tootsie pop. I went through boxes of these. I really hate to think of what's in them - all the dyes.... shudder! but smoking is worse and that's GONE! Not a puff in five years. Don't need the tootsie pops anymore either. Try tootsie pops and quitnet.com

A rare find in the US, this Latin American coffee is as good as instant coffee gets. They use a blend of coffee and caramelized sugar to produce this mild, great tasting coffee. I find it works nicely in coffee smoothies and other blended coffee drinks. Once opened, it doesn't keep much longer than a month though.

Besides my morning espresso coffees to wake up promptly, I always loved the Vanilla Instant Coffee in the afternoon. Unfortunately - like other reviewers mentioned - this taste doesn't come in the old containers any longer. It is much too expensive to use 2-3 sticks for one cup with full flavor.
Perhaps Nescafe will think that over - IF THEY READ OUR REVIEWS ???

PS: At Walmart and Publix a single pack of 20 is cheaper than at Amazon. I'm just saying...

We prefer Grade B dark maple syrup over light or even Grade A, for some reason. Grade B dark just seems to have a more full flavor without being overpowering. The test comes immediately after opening the container: fill a teaspoon, and taste it straight out of the jug. I honestly have never tasted better maple syrup - and we've used pure maple syrup for many years, tried a lot of brands and purchased many gallons of it.

And if they're able to hold the price at this level, we'll continue to buy it. Maple syrup has just skyrocketed over the past few years, so we thought we'd been priced out of the market for good maple syrup. The price on this we a little below others on Amazon.com, and considerably better than anything available in our local grocery stores, plus we were finally experiencing maple syrup withdrawal. So after having used "maple flavored" syrup from the supermarket on our most recent batch of pancakes, we decided to see what Amazon had. WOW! We really have not tasted any better maple syrup. I had to hold back after that first teaspoon to keep from eating another, and another, and.... We satisfied that with pancakes for dinner that night. :>)

This is good - really good! And we're very careful to reserve 5-star ratings for only the very best.
